Hi, I’m Emily Lyons and I think all inspiring people are inspired people. Being a businesswoman, CEO, serial entrepreneur, survivor, and general life enthusiast - I’m endlessly jazzed by the business of life, especially the stories of extraordinary people I’ve had the privilege to meet. I don’t think it’s fair to keep that privilege to myself and I think you deserve to be utterly lifted and shifted by these people too. What sort of people? People from a variety of businesses, top entrepreneurs, actors, pro athletes, influencers, models, and the boy next door - but most importantly, all raw and fallible human beings who have persevered beyond extremes to become the successes they are today.

description: Fear, Uncertainty, and Doubt, or FUD, hold most people back from the life they desire, not lack of talent or ability.  In what the FUD!? we discuss a wide range of topics from personal growth and entrepreneurship, to emerging trends and technologies such as Tesla and solar. So whether you've procrastinated starting that business idea in fear of public failure, passed on opportunity because of uncertainty, or shied away from something new and unknown due to doubt, what the FUD has a podcast for you. title: Mortgage Manager Playbook
description:
Looking for management solutions for your mortgage business? Want to excel in your role and take your team to the next level? You’ve come to the right place! Now you can access the minds of industry leaders to help solve pain points in your sales organization. Boost your business, manage expenses, grow your team, and retain your people with expert guidance.
 
Welcome to the Mortgage Manager Playbook. Find interviews with top sales leaders/experts and learn practical tips for improving sales results. This podcast is for mortgage sales managers in banks, credit unions and IMBs—specifically sales executives with P&L responsibilities. Challenge yourself to increase production and profitability with guidance from leaders in the field. Learn how they handle these issues so you can emulate their success in your business processes.
 
Subject matter experts give listeners quality information they can use to take their mortgage business to the next level. Hear 20-minute interviews about how to tackle the toughest challenges facing managers today. Find out the best practices for increasing revenue and productivity. Discover future trends in financial services. Grow your business and get more from your sales personnel. Understand the causes of management issues and implement solutions from experienced professionals and executives who’ve been through it all.
 
The Mortgage Manager Playbook offers an avenue for industry professionals to deliver their message and create an impression. This is an opportunity for both guests and listeners to build a database of contacts, create a network that benefits these partnerships, and promote connections in the growing space of mortgage lending.
 
Pat Sherlock hosts this podcast series, offering years of experience as a financial executive and consultant. She is the President and chief sales trainer at QFS Sales Solutions, one of the mortgage industry’s top research-backed sales consulting firms. A sought-after sales trainer and speaker at mortgage banking conferences, Pat is known as a straight-shooter who delivers on improving performance for sales organizations. The author of the MBA best-seller, “Reaching the Top of Your Game: Best Practices of Top Mortgage Originators,” she frequently contributes to mortgage trade publications and conducts popular webinars for MBA Education.
 
Known as the “Terry Gross of Mortgage Lending,” Pat partners with esteemed guests who leave out unnecessary fluff. With genuine interest and curiosity, she asks deep questions. This isn't a run-of-the-mill mortgage banking podcast. Get to know professional names, build relationships, and establish a place in the industry.
 
Jumpstart your momentum towards managerial success with helpful advice from the authorities in your field. The Mortgage Manager Playbook equips listeners with a curated database of everything needed for success in sales and management results in mortgage lending. Learn valuable training methods and strategies to help you and your team go above and beyond.
 
If your sales team needs training on hiring and lead generation, Pat is here to lend a helping hand. Get your weekly dose of management solutions for your business right here. Don’t forget to subscribe to the show, so you don’t miss an episode. Visit https://mortgagemanagerplaybook.com/ for more information.

title: The Mix
description:
Andy and Kishan, two sophomores from Yale bring on guests from all around the world to discuss a wide range of issues such as political correctness, economics, and computer science.

Andy was born in Florida to two immigrants from China who came to America seeking a better life. As a he grew older, he became more aware of political issues involving immigration, economic inequality, and education. In his free time, he enjoys trading stocks, coding, and reading. Now at Yale, he's studying Computer Science and Economics, hoping to one day find his own business.

Kishan was raised in Upstate New York to two immigrants from Zambia and India. His parents ran a small motel business and through these experiences, he came to appreciate the values of hard work and determination. Kishan competed in FIRST Robotics and qualified two times in a row to attend the international championship. Now at Yale he is double majoring in computer science and statistics & data science, hoping to attend law school and pursue a career in tech policy.

description: Hola Gwapas! And welcome The Hola Gwapa Podcast! I'm your host and fellow Creative, Nisha Btesh. Each week I’ll be interviewing a brand new Artist from the Hola Gwapa community and we’ll be having REAL up close & personal conversations about the ups and downs of their unique journeys - highlighting all the different ways creatives at the top of their game are using to turn their passions into a paycheck! We’ll touch on topics like how to develop a solid morning routine, how to talk confidently about pricing your work, monetizing your talent & maintaining control of your finances as well as what it truly takes to build and grow a community in this digital age. Plus you know I’ll be asking for all their juicy tips, tricks and secret sauces to success! SO I hope this podcast provides you with tangible takeaways and introduces you to a wide variety of fabulous female creatives each with a different story, medium and message - but most of all I hope you walk away feeling a little less alone and more inspired than ever to keep your Artistic and Entrepreneurial hustle strong knowing that The Hola Gwapa community truly is your safe space to share, connect with and celebrate the creative in you.

title: Hunger for the Hustle Podcast
description:
Live upfront down-to-earth interviews with entrepreneurs, business owners, creatives, and hustlers from around the world. 


Diving deep into the journey, challenges wins, and the mindset of owning and operating your own business, side hustle, or not-for-profit. 


Learn what it's really like to ride the rollercoaster journey of entrepreneurship and what it takes to be a full-time hustler from people who are living it. We want you to become inspired and motivated to make the switch from employee to entrepreneur, ignite your own inner hunger for the hustle and turn your passion into your paycheque.


We are also advocates for talking about mental health and mental wealth which is a key ingredient in the life of any business owner or operator and you'll hear us discussing mental health, awareness, and mindset regularly and openly on the show. 


If you enjoy the show, please show your support by subscribing, giving us a review, and sharing it with your family, friends, peers, and colleagues so they can enjoy it too!


Connect with us on social media - All platforms: @Hungerforthehustle

description: Ashley Benfit is a videographer, photographer, influencer, and loving wife and mother. Justin Benfit happens to be the lucky father and husband in this happy little family, as well as a veteran sales professional and an avid student of history. Remi is the third member of the trio; a part-time star of Ashley’s life-style blog and full-time butter-ball/inspiration for almost everything his parents aspire to become. The Mom and Dad Podcast is a journey to find balance between family and following the tracks of success left in memoirs, biographies and books written by some of the greatest thought leaders across the generations; wrapped each week into 45 minute bite-sized packages for you to consume as you too work to become the best version of yourself.

description: The Moving Podcast seeks to educate and shine light on innovative mobility solutions from various immigration regimes from around the world. Although its drivers may be different, such as global warming and geopolitical-economic trade, the need for a new type of globalization to take shape and people will need to adapt by moving- swiftly. Our goal is to highlight global mobility solutions from the leading experts to help individuals make informed decisions… to make moving not only possibility, but a reality!

title: Avec I/O
description:
Avec is a architect led design-build firm located in downtown Ames, IA. Avec believes that there is a way to do architecture that brings together designers and contractors collaborating with the client to deliver a built project, a process that energizes and empowers the design team, the construction team, and ultimately the owner. Avec is French for “with”, meaning that we want to work alongside every entity involved in a project, as a team, with each other, working for the same end goal.

Explore the multifaceted nature of the building process through the eyes of architects, designers, and contractors.  Interviews and discussions with tradespeople in the industry make up the bulk of this content with an emphasis on providing a service to all who are interested in how buildings come together both on the residential and commercial level.  Listeners can expect to gain unique insight from experts on a variety of topics as we explore the complex organism that is the built environment.

Walk with us!

www.avecdesignbuild.com
www.patreon.com/avecdesignbuild

title: Success at Scale with Triple G Ventures Podcast
description:
Success at Scale with Triple G Ventures Podcast covers business stories from experienced entrepreneurs, business leaders, and startup founders on how to translate business ideas into business results. In each episode, Gregg shows how companies grow from seed to scale, testing his theories with successful business leaders. 

As a listener, you can walk through unique business growth journeys, including brand building, business development, revenue growth, investor relations and capital fundraising, culture and team building, and more. Success at scale with Triple G  is all about best practices and ideas to help you accelerate your business growth. 

Success at Scale is hosted by Gregg Stein, Founding Partner of Triple G Ventures. Through Triple G Ventures, Gregg serves as CEO, Board Member, and Investor at SKOOG INC, and also leads Strategic Growth at Artiphon, ASI Audio, Hummingbirds.Ai, Promoly and many more.

title: The Greg McAfee Show
description:
An award-winning entrepreneur, Greg McAfee has a passion for helping business owners take their businesses to new heights. In 1990, Greg started McAfee Heating and Air Conditioning Co., his only capital was a meager $274 and a well-used truck. Today, Greg runs one of the most successful HVAC companies in the Midwest and is called upon to share his expertise with other business owners all over the nation. 

In his new book, “Build and Grow Your HVAC Business”, Greg shares nine elements that will guide you in growing your business. He loves to inspire others to chase their dreams at full force, just as he has in his own life and business. Greg is still the working President of his company and puts the same systems and ideas in to place at his own laboratory, McAfee Heating and Air Conditioning Company, in Dayton, Ohio. 

Greg resides in Beavercreek, Ohio. Several years ago Greg sent articles to national trade magazines and many were published, which led to coaching, which led to business boot camps/revivals, and now The Greg McAfee Show. All these services help HVAC business owners think different and help grow their companies.

title: Tile Freak Podcast

You are not here to learn how to finish a backsplash or a shower. This is a real and raw look at business and the relationship between clients and customers. Lessons learned, trends, and advice for all business owners to run their companies in the most efficient and lucrative way.

Hosted by Horacio Ruiz and Stefan von Imhof, we focus on alternatives to traditional assets; including collectibles, wine, watches, sneakers, NFTs, artwork, websites, farmland, equity crowdfunding, and even stuff like legos, billboards and private islands.

Each episode explores a different theme, and usually includes an interview with interesting folks in the alternative investments space. Past guests include Ezra Levine, CEO of Collectable, Kenny Rose, CEO of FranShares, and Travis Winn from ZED RUN.

Conversations that women rarely have but really should.
The vision of THE SHE WORD is to have open and honest discussion about the topics that affect us as women, but are rarely shared.
To normalise being open about topics that affect significant percentages of us as women, but we feel nervous to discuss with each other, even our closest friends.
To share information and experience, to be informed, to be honest and to empower other women in doing so.

description:
Criado pela AFEAL - Associação Nacional de Fabricantes de Esquadrias de Alumínio, este canal oferece dois programas. Em "Janela do Empreendedorismo", o podcast que inspira o setor de esquadrias de alumínio, diversas personalidades do setor contam sobre como chegaram ao sucesso, combinando detalhes de sua vida pessoal, gostos e habilidades, relembrando desafios e grandes vitórias nos negócios. 

Já "Flashes AFEAL traz “pílulas” de conteúdo, protagonizadas pelo consultor da AFEAL e especialista no mercado de esquadrias J. C. G. Noronha, explorando os números mais importantes do mercado para os empreendedores do segmento de esquadrias de alumínio.

title: Billionaire Brainstorming
description: In January, 2021, the common man united against the faceless and powerful hedge fund billionaires in an all out "War on Wall Street." It revealed a fatal flaw in the current U.S. economy while subsequently proving that the average person is closer to being a billionaire than they think. So, what do the wealthy... do? How do they spend their money? How did they make it? Join me, Connor Lewis, as I break down the stories behind the world's elite and learn how we can apply their pasts to our future.

title: Rankable

title: Your Artsy Friend
description:
Hey, you! Yes, you – the one with the creative soul and a heart full of dreams!

Welcome to a podcast that's like that friend who shows up with a cup of coffee, ready to chat about all things art, life, and the beautiful mess in between.

You're listening to - "Your Artsy Friend" – a cozy space where we celebrate the amazingness that is YOU and your incredible creative journey.

Ever had those moments when self-doubt sneaks in and tells you your art isn't good enough? I've been there too, and this podcast is here to remind us that perfection is seriously overrated. We'll dive into the realness of embracing imperfections, share stories that'll make you nod in agreement, and find inspiration even in the tiniest of moments.

Expect giggles, aha moments, and a whole lot of camaraderie. This podcast is like a heartwarming chat with your closest friend who knows that art isn't just about what you create – it's about the joy, the passion, and the journey.

Why "Your Artsy Friend"? Because I'm here to be just that – your artsy confidante, your partner in creativity, and your biggest cheerleader.

So, grab a cozy blanket, your favorite sketchbook, and let's dive into this adventure together.

title: The Justin Spaulding Show
description:
Justin Spaulding has grown from zero to $100,000,000+ in real estate in less than a decade. And The Justin Spaulding Show is all about sharing that wisdom and advice, from real life experiences, to help other achieve awareness, strategy and tactics around:
-Money
-Personal Finances
-Business
-Real Estate
-Entrepreneurship
-Negotiation
-Sales
-Health
-Mindset
& more!

Justin shares everything from how he has built a real estate empire valued at over $100,000,000; sales changed his life, and strategies to use to have success in whatever it is you want to be successful at in life.

Justin graduated college in 2012 and was an NCAA All-American football player. Throughout college he read over 100 books on real estate, money, finance, and more. He was determined to then implement what he learned.

After graduation he got involved in sales and grew his team to the top of a direct sales company. He saved all of those earnings and bought a couple of four unit apartment buildings. Others wanted to start investing with him.

Today he has over 60 investors who have invested $20,000,000 into his private equity companies and today they own over 700 apartments and multiple commercial health care properties.

Justin plans to grow his real estate holdings to over 50,000 apartments in the coming years.

In March 2020, Justin started a "Prime Painters". They focus on painting his apartments, as well as other residential and commercial painting projects in Southern Wisconsin and Northern Illinois.

Please subscribe to the podcast and checkout his book here: https://justinspaulding.com/products/build-wealth-in-real-estate-book-pre-order.

title: Tutors of Life
description:
We are Shaun and Sam Tutor that research life, so you don’t have to.

The Tutors specialize in business, real estate and personal growth. We like to learn about anything we can and teach you as we go along in life. Monday's are our Tutor episodes where we try to teach you something new, and Friday's are our episodes where you can hear us talk about anything we want. Our goal is to help someone out in the world, but also entertain as much as we possibly can.

title: The Sound of Success with Nic Harcourt
description: Fascinating folks of note, from writers and musicians/artists to business and tech leaders, are interviewed by well-known LA radio DJ Nic Harcourt about the songs, bands, and concerts that have influenced their lives from childhood to now. What are the tracks they return to over and over, and what new artists have they embraced in recent years? Would they be the person they are today without this music? With the Sound of Success, Harcourt turns his legendarily expansive knowledge of music to host revealing and relatable interviews about the artists and sounds that have meant the most to a wide range of people.

title: Spotlight With
description: When it comes to success, people tend to look at the results. It’s like an iceberg – people only see the top, they don’t see what’s beneath it. Spotlight is telling stories of real people who achieved success with hard work and determination. All the gory bits included.

Enjoy & SUBSCRIBE

title: The Ambition Accelerator
description:
Build your confidence, develop your skills and mindset, and achieve your greatest ambitions.

The Ambition Accelerator is here to motivate you to achieve your career goals - whether that means taking the corporate route, becoming an entrepreneur, or anything in between.
Join Sophie Milliken, award-winning entrepreneur, as she talks with other thriving businesswomen to help you learn what it takes to achieve success.

Featuring advice from female figureheads in the business world - including Dragons’ Den’s Sara Davies MBE, The Apprentice’s Linda Plant, and founder and former CEO of Pacific Direct Lara Morgan - The Ambition Accelerator will inspire you to take action to power up your professional success.

description: Join multi-passionate Creative Entrepreneur Aly Nagel as she delves into the topics of mental health + wellness, entrepreneurship, cannabis, sustainable beauty + fashion, sex + dating, social justice and more. Explore her real and raw conversations with a diverse group of fellow entrepreneurs and experts where they get vulnerable while having a little bit of cheeky fun. Aly’s learning along the way and winging it just like the rest of us!

With many life lessons, ups and downs, and overcoming many set backs in life, Chad will dive head first into real life lessons and get straight to the point. As an Entrepreneur & Mentor, Chad will give you life advice on how to navigate business, relationships, and will offer advice to help you reach your full potential in Life. Chad learned from a young age how to work hard for what he wanted to be successful and now he wants to share his success with others. Chad will share ideas and experiences from like-minded individuals who have the same drive and advice that can help you pursue your truest self.

title: The High Performance PT Academy
description:
Tony Pang is the coach of the successful High Performance PT Academy and advises Personal Trainers on how to create a motivating, creative and educating business.
With over 12 years of experience as a leading personal trainer and fitness model, I have coached over 1000 online clients and hundreds of 1-2-1 clients. I know what it takes to make your personal training business a success in this industry.
The PT Academy's mission is to help you do what you may think is impossible for you and your business, to help you grow and expand your dream personal training model.
It provides simple, powerful strategies, systems, mindsets and tools to help you generate more clients and work a more effective and productive business model.
Helping PT's develop their online training services allowing them to grow in the fastest easiest way and to really master what can sometimes seem like a complex area for personal trainers.

title: Elu on Müük
description:

description:
Modern Samurai Podcast explores "Samurai Thinking," tactics practiced by Japanese warriors for 1,200 years. The Samurai endeavoured to have Shoshin, a beginner's mindset, and improve mental focus (Fudoshin). The warriors were singularly focused, constantly refining and improving their swordsmanship and learning to be calm under pressure in battle by clearing their minds of distracting emotions (Mushin).

The Executive Budo ("Boo Doe," Martial Way) Strategy & Mindset program teaches "Samurai thinking," warrior strategies that are equally valuable in the modern world for executives, entrepreneurs, artists, influencers, experts and business owners.

title: Spilling the Tea with MSheLE
description:
The podcast that brings together legal leaders and trailblazers to candidly share insights into their careers, with the goal of helping you succeed in yours. We ask each guest the same ten questions:
1. What does success mean to you?
2. What is the biggest change you'd like to see in the legal profession?
3. What do you want an ally to do to support women lawyers?
4. When is a time you didn't stand up for yourself, and what is your biggest regret in not doing so?
5. What advice do you wish you had been given when you started practicing law?
6. How do you handle interrupters/mansplainers? 
7. What is an un/under -recognized hurdle for women in the legal profession? 
8. What makes you feel powerful?
9. What are 3 words that best describe you and how do you want to be remembered?

Amid the COVID-19 pandemic, I sought out a way to create content that, like Coffee With Composers allows people to connect to musicians on a personal level. During this time, I thought we needed it more than usual. When members of the Glenn Korff School of Music reached out to me about creating videos to help keep our community connected, I thought this would be a perfect idea. Going beyond the Flyover New Music Series, in Chatting With Creators, I connect with various creatives from the music industry to talk to them about how they’re dealing with the pandemic, their advice for students, and most importantly, how we all stay connected even when we’re apart. 

I thought this would be a one-and-done series, but I've had so many requests to continue! I love making the series, so here's season two! For season one information, check out sapphiretoth.com

To enjoy this podcast: You don’t need a mathematics degree. You don’t need to be an economics master. You don’t need to be a fund manager. 

You just need to be: Open to thinking differently. Curious to explore that difference. And financially literate to profit from it.

“It is impossible to begin to learn that which one thinks one already knows.” - Epictetus

description: Cullen Gilchrist, CEO & Founder of Union Kitchen, takes a deep dive behind the scenes of packaged Food and Beverage businesses made in DC. From launch to national scale, Cullen speaks with DC founders about their challenges and triumphs throughout their journey to building successful CPG food businesses. Union Kitchen is a food business Accelerator. We build successful food brands by bringing together our Accelerator with our Kitchen, Distribution, and Stores. Since 2012, we have worked with over 650 food businesses including over 100 Accelerator members.

title: Rainbow Radio
description: Welcome to Rainbow Radio; the Del Rainbow Podcast. Bringing you raw conversations with creatives, intuitives, entrepreneurs, motivational speakers & information seekers.

title: Recon Labs
description:
Recon Labs is a podcast that showcases the many sides of successful entrepreneurship for military veterans.

Our Frontline Founders series focuses on technology entrepreneurship and veterans who have founded and built great technology companies.

Our Search & Acquire series focuses on veterans who have pursued small business ownership via entrepreneurship through acquisition, also known as search funds.

It's hard work to serve in the military. It's hard work to create and build a new technology company or to find, acquire and operate a small business successfully.

What about these veterans' service helped them build and lead their companies? What obstacles did they need to overcome? 

Recon Labs opens the aperture for current servicemembers and for veterans, and shows the general public the power of these veterans' hard work, integrity, flexibility, and humor in the face of ambiguity and challenges.

title: Changing Reality
description:
Changing Reality is a segment on WQHS Radio, the University of Pennsylvania’s official student-run radio channel, that features top executives, social changemakers, game-changing entrepreneurs and inspiring individuals from across the world. Hear their inspiring stories on how they are changing the reality that they live in!

Changing Reality is hosted by Harsha, an 18-year-old social entrepreneur and an undergraduate student at Penn. She is the co-founder and Chief Marketing Officer of Ascendance, a youth movement that empowers over 4,000 students in 270 communities. Harsha is also the CEO and Founder of the social start-up, StartMyName.com, a multiple TEDx and international conference speaker and the author of "The Makings of A Teenage Entrepreneur".

Conversations are candid and transparent just as if Steve and the guests are just "hanging out in the Starks lounge!"

I'm just normal guy aspiring to build a personal brand and promote personal development and becoming the best possible version of yourself. This podcast will provide my insight and perspective on the most important pillars of life: Physical Health, Mental Health, Financial Habits, and finding Passion and Happiness! Centered around my love for business and entrepreneurship, and leveraging the things I have learned from people MUCH more successful than me, this podcast is designed to open everyone's eyes to what's possible once you implement successful habits and make cents out of your own life

Each question unlocks opinions on popular topics including latest fashion trends & future project aspirations, as well as, aiming to shed light on the process of being a creator & the source of their motivation behind certain bodies of work and projects.

¡Hello Beauty Bosses! Si no me conoces, soy Patricia Carreño, empresaria con más de 20 años de experiencia en negocios dentro de la industria de la belleza y hoy por hoy, fundadora y directora de la academia de micropigmentación más importante en América Latina. #BeautyAngelsAcademy. 

Y he creado este podcast para ti, para ti que tienes un pequeño negocio enfocado en la belleza, un spa, pones uñas, cortas cabello ¡Lo que sea! Si tu negocio se dedica a embellecer a las personas este podcast, es para ti. 

Te voy a contar como hice para crecer de un pequeño salón de belleza en la cochera de mi madre a una empresa internacional que factura millones de pesos al mes. 

Quiero que te sientas, cómoda y segura conmigo para que tomes lo mejor de este podcast, lo apliques en tu negocio y logres hacerlo crecer SIN TANTO DRAMA.

Now we want to expand into the realm of podcasting, both for the potential of video and audio content, but to create a human connection between our clients and their audience. We use this not only for our podcasts, but to use for our clients as well.

description: Being self-employed requires a certain level of crazy. Building a brand takes patience. And dealing with social media anxiety...hunny, we all do it! Join Photographer and Digital Brand Strategist Kelley Raye for a candid conversation with other women entrepreneurs about how they continue to grow their business, even on days when they want to quit. We're diving into goals, epic fails, dreams, rejection, self-care, comparison, imposter syndrome, big wins, risk, and everything in between.

title: The One Away Show
description:
My name is Bryan Wish. I’m an entrepreneur, CEO, and pathfinder.  If I’ve learned anything in life, it’s that self-discovery is a critical part of living intentionally, building meaningful relationships, and achieving the future we see for ourselves. 

In July of 2021, I sold all of my possessions, headed west, and began a quest to live a fuller and more meaningful life. 

The experience helped me truly understand the power of a single moment. 

And through my conversations with leaders from all walks of life, I’ve seen how that one phone call, heartbreak, diagnosis, or lost job can transform the entire course of our lives. 

In this podcast, I sit down with entrepreneurs, influencers, and experts across industries to talk through the events that changed everything. Together, we’ll relive the make-or-break decisions, hard conversations, periods of despair and hope, chance encounters—and everything that followed.

After graduating from Western Illinois University in 1994, he went to work for Horace Mann Insurance company as a multi-line insurance agent and registered representative in the Chicago western suburbs.  After five years of working as an agent, he was promoted to Manager of the Northern Illinois Agency and was responsible for the sales goals, development and mentoring of agents in the designated territory.

Crypto audio stream looking at the latest crypto news and see what has been happening in the Crypto space.

We are NOT financial advisers. None of what we have communicated verbally or in writing here should be considered as financial advice; it is NOT. Do your own research before investing in any digital asset, and understand that investing in any crypto is risky. If you do, you need to be prepared to lose your entire investment.

⚠ This video is for information / entertainment purposes only ⚠
All our videos are strictly personal opinions. Please make sure to do your own research and never take our opinions for financial guidance. There are multiple strategies and not all strategies fit all people. Our videos ARE NOT financial advice.

Are you struggling and frustrated as a small business owner?

Do you wish that your business ran smoother, with employees who were more engaged and productive?

Do you spend so much time running your business that you have little if any time to do the things you really love to do?

If you answered yes to any or all of these questions, then The Freedom Focused Podcast is made for you!

In this podcast, you will learn just how to do that, and in the process make greater personal and professional freedom as a small business owner a reality rather than just a dream!

title: The OMNI Podcast
description:
The OMNI Show™ podcast s designed for anyone desiring motivation, direction, and focus in life. Host Brad Georgiev has amassed a passionate following of over 100k social media followers, including business professionals, entrepreneurs, and small business owners with his expertise and passion for helping motivate people to become the best version of themselves.
.
In this podcast, Brad blends his experience working as a manual therapist, movement specialist & business owner, so that you can understand that achieving great things in life does not necessarily mean that you have to be a genius or born in a favorable environment. The perspective you have on life and what happens to you will determine your development. When you master your mindset, you master your life.
.
Over the past 10 years, Brad has been learning from multiple successful business owners and has managed to personally build a 6-figure business all by the age of 27. 
.
If you're ready to take your life to the next level, are searching for more purpose, or just need extra inspiration or motivation, tune in to The OMNI Show™ podcast.
.
Follow Brad on Instagram @brad_georgiev

Have you ever wanted to launch a startup but you didn’t know how? This is the question that we, Gary, Johnny and Matteo, three college students have been asking ourselves for a long time. This is the reason why we decided to start the podcast, “Zero to One”. In this podcast, you will have the chance to learn from the very best entrepreneurs and investors the most important tools to start your journey into entrepreneurship. The Gloss Alumni share what they know, we promise there will be mountains of discussion and tips on the creative process, design knowledge shared and life experience hacks. Everything you need for a lifetime of creative work. 
Amanda is curious about where creativity starts, her first question to her guests always, how did you become creative? 
Amanda apologizes in advance for saying 'I guess' too many times but hey, you can only be yourself.

We acknowledge the traditional custodians of the land on which The Creative Trust Podcast is recorded The Wurundjeri people, Elders past and present of The Kulin Nations, Naarm (Melbourne, Australia)

title: The Power Of Leverage 101
description:
Welcome, welcome and thank you for being here. We are the Power of Leverage 101. There are many shows today that will give you textbook definition of how things should or could be done.  We wanted to separate ourselves from that style, our guests will be able to tell you exactly how they made it, in their selective fields. We didn't want to limit ourselves with topics so we have chosen a substantially broader spectrum of topics to cover, from business, entrepreneurship, personal finance, and personal development. To ethics, self love, self expression, joy and happiness. There will always be something for everyone!

We wanted to make sure that you were able to see, first hand, what the journey looks like and how you can make it work for you. Since we've all had different experience in life before embarking on this journey. It is nice to be able to add the perspective of other like-minded individuals.

title: Between Friends
description: I was at a concert and the artist asked a question that really sank into my soul.  Many times, I hear things people say and I usually need them to re-call what they actually said, but not this.  Her question to the audience was, “Do you remember the moment when you no longer remembered who you were before?”.  Immediately tears pooled in my eyes because I had been in that spot many times.  I looked at my sister next to me and no words needed to be spoken because we were thinking of the exact same thing.  As those next few notes rang out over the crowd from the grand piano, I had no clue what a wild ride this question would take me on, and the journey of self-discovery that should have happened years ago, but better late than never.  So here I am, freezing moments in time between friends!

description:
Let’s be honest, we all struggle to find and maintain a healthy work-life balance.
Perhaps some of us more than others, but we all have those times where we just need someone to give us just a little bit of inspiration to keep on keeping on.
 
We are here to help provide that inspiration! Winning with Beckwith is a biweekly podcast focused on conversations with top business owners and leaders, in the local community, where we break down areas within business and life. Each episode is unique and contains powerful advice and information for individuals in all walks of life. Join us as we share actionable insights while revealing practical sales and leadership skills that will help you grow, both in business, and in life.
 
Meet the Host: Matt Beckwith is among the Top Mortgage Loan Originators in the country, according to the Scotsman Guide, and an owner of OVM Financial. OVM Financial is one of INC 5,000’s fastest growing private companies in America.
 
Listen in and learn the most effective ways to help grow your business and leadership abilities and cultivate a complete work-life balance, today! If you’re looking to scale your business and win back your life, this show is for you!

The Power of Leadership, Open Hearts and Inspiration.  Hi, I am Muriel. After spending years as a counselor helping people find employment and careers and help support their journey and challenges, I know one thing for sure.  Every single person has a limited amount of time and everyone has a heart song; something inside that makes your soul sing.  Something that you were born to do.  Now more than ever the power of a single life should never be undervalued, forgotten, without support or love.  Awakening your powerful leader and calling it into action, this is what I talk about.  Join me on discovering the keys to happiness, success and abundance and becoming a powerful leader of your life.

title: WTF Am I Drinking?
description:
This is a podcast + blog series born out of conversations about how literally every single one of us who enjoy craft beer, hard seltzer, cider, wine spritzers, canned cocktails, hard teas, hard kombuchas--you name it--is operating at a different level of knowledge. Some of us are connoisseurs, some of us are newbies. Some of us want to reach expert status, some of us really don’t care how the sausage, or seltzer, is made as long as it tastes good--but so we do want to know how and why a particular seltzer does indeed taste good.

WTF Am I Drinking? is an explainer series that will dive into different topics like what a certain beer or wine style is, how a hard kombucha gets made, what the difference is between a stout and a porter--things like that. It’s educational and informational but in the most fun way possible--consider it the perfect thing to do while you sip your favorite beverage. You’ll learn a thing or two, and no doubt develop a deeper appreciation for drink X, Y, or Z. Basically, we all get to geek out a little, and dish on the beverages we love.

Being a student of the game means embracing a relentless pursuit of knowledge and understanding. In the context of life and business, it signifies the mindset of continuous learning, growth, and adaptation. "Student of The Game Podcast" encapsulates this mindset, as Tim Stone skillfully uncovers the hidden gems of wisdom from his guests, providing actionable strategies and showcasing stories of triumph and perseverance. Whether you're an aspiring entrepreneur or a seasoned business owner, this podcast is a must-listen, guiding you on a journey of entrepreneurial growth and inspiring you to approach success as an ongoing learning experience.

Sono tematiche complesse che diventano addirittura ostiche e incomprensibili nel caso in cui esse non siano dapprima comprese nella loro parte ‘basica’, indispensabile per una loro corretta interpretazione ed applicazione a casi concreti professionali.

title: LA JEFA ERES TÚ
description:
El canal que empodera y da visibilidad a la mujer.

Olga Jiménez comparte claves sobre productividad, organización, ventas, liderazgo y motivación entre otros.

Además, el canal cuenta con invitadas del mundo de los negocios, el deporte, el arte, la moda, la cultura, el emprendimiento y mucho más.

Olga Jiménez es experta en ventas, motivación y liderazgo, empresaria y autora.

Desde el año 2002 ha liderado a miles de mujeres en el sector de la venta directa de alta cosmética, logrando las posiciones más altas y los mayores reconocimientos.

Ha sido invitada como mentora en distintos puntos de España, Europa, Estados Unidos y Latinoamérica.

El estilo de comunicación de Olga es tremendamente inspirador, positivo y empoderador.

Ganó su primer millón antes de los treinta y actualmente su negocio factura alrededor de seis millones de euros anuales.

Su primer libro LA JEFA ERES TÚ, se ha posicionado en el puesto número de 1 de AMAZON más de 40 veces desde su lanzamiento. Además, ha aparecido en Business Insider como uno de los 7 mejores libros de liderazgo femenino junto a los de Melinda Gates y Ana Botín.  

Desde enero de 2022 es conductora del programa de radio semanal “LA JEFA ERES TÚ El programa que empodera y da visibilidad a la mujer” en RKB BARCELONA 106.9FM.

Ella cree en un concepto holístico de la mujer de negocios para quien el triunfo profesional sea la llave para una vida personal todavía más exitosa.

A través de su libro, canal, podcast, conferencias y programa de radio te mostrará cómo lograrlo.

title: The Chemfluencer
description:
#Chemfluencer a podcast by CheMondis.

The chemical industry goes digital. But, what does that mean? What issues will be driving us in the future? Which innovations are exciting the industry?

In the #chemfluencer podcast, we discuss with experts about trends, challenges and innovations driving the industry. 

Once a month we will discuss the latest trends and updates around the chemical industry with different specialists. Logistic crisis, investments in digital solutions, which skillsets are required today and which role plays agile leadership? We will take a closer look at each of them and many more.

During your daily work you often come across many exciting topics, pick up some new buzzwords or headlines from the countless newsletters you subscribed. Most of the time, however, there is not enough time to deal with the most important information about the topic in a short and crisp way. 

With the Chemfluencer podcast we want to change that. Exciting trends & news from the industry in a compact form to listen to on demand - wherever and whenever you want.

The free episodes will be available on this page and all common audio platforms.

Tune in!

PR Podcast with Vera Makki merupakan payung besar podcast terkait Public Relations, Communications, dan Social Impact. 

Vera Makki adalah praktisi Public Relations yang telah malang melintang lebih dari 20 tahun, mulai dari dunia broadcasting, konsultan PR, hingga sebagai in-house PR dan Corporate Affairs berbagai industri multi-nasional companies seperti FMCG, dairy, otomotif, dan perbankan. Saat sebagai konsultan PR, Vera menangani klien-klien BUMN dan multi-nasional di bidang teknologi. 

Dengan kaya pengalaman di dunia komunikasi, Vera memutuskan untuk berkontribusi lebih banyak lagi dan memberikan dampak yang lebih besar bagi masyarakat luas dengan mendirikan VMCS Advisory Indonesia (VMCS: Vera Makki Communications and Social Impact). VMCS merupakan penasihat dan konsultan public relations yang menyediakan layanan bagi institusi maupun individu. Saat ini Vera diberikan amanah sebagai President, International Association of Business Communicators (IABC) - Indonesia Chapter. 

Podcast ini juga dapat disimak di Youtube Vera Makki.

title: Boi Ngoc Mentor
description:
Hello, my name is Boi Ngoc, and this is the podcast to share my journey of living. 

Ten years ago, I built my reputation, expertise, business and career from scratch without any mentors, guidance and role models. Growing up in a low class family in Vietnam, I know how it feels like to live with limited resources and I need to figure things out by myself. 

I self-taught myself playing the piano, build a personal brand, create a unique methodology that helps thousands of people learn to play piano in 6-8 weeks, build an online business. Apart from that, going through life with some traumatic events helps me become stronger. 

This podcast channel is created to share my thoughts, journey, experience on some topics such as: Self-love, Self-acceptance, Confidence, Goal Setting, Self-development, Ownership Mindset, Entrepreneurship. 

* Join Boi Ngoc Mentor’s Membership to work directly with me at: https://boingocmentor.com/

—

Mình là Bội Ngọc, đây là Podcast mình chia sẻ về những chiêm nghiệm của mình về các chủ đề: Yêu bản thân - Tự tin - Đặt mục tiêu - Tư duy làm chủ cuộc sống - Phát triển bản thân - Khởi Nghiệp

title: It's Not Over
description:
It’s Not Over is like real-time therapy for entrepreneurs and business owners. 

Each episode is about vulnerable, honest and frank conversations with entrepreneurs who have survived near-death business experiences. 

Too often I listen to entrepreneurs and business owners talk about how they became rich, how deeply they read, how they invest their exit money and how they have found peace recently through meditation and Naval’s tweets. 

Every entrepreneur I know has a story of survival. On this show, I talk to entrepreneurs about their own stories of survival and success. We discuss the players involved, the lessons learned, the strategy that helped them out of their death spirals and dive deeply into how these experiences changed the way they build and run businesses. 

I also urge my guests to talk more openly about how business catastrophe impacted their personal lives and mental health.

Each episode will change how you see your own obstacles both personal and professional. 

Every guest will teach you lessons to apply in your own life and business.

title: The Marathon Continues Podcast
description:
Welcome to The Marathon Continues Podcast - Presented by HYP Nutrition! In this podcast, we plan to discuss topics in the entrepreneurship, self-development, and fitness realm. 

Hosted by Kyle Novak & Estevan Salinas, these are two recently college graduates that decided to take a leap of faith by starting HYP Nutrition in May of 2020. They wanted a brand that represented people who aspire to be the best version of themselves; in any aspect of their life. They know that self-development is a ever lasting battle and constantly one that is uphill - that is where the term "HYP" was established; which stands for Hit Your Peak. As time went on, we knew getting on as many platforms as possible would be the fastest way to help the most people and build our community. That is why this podcast was created; to try to give y'all insight or different perspectives on variety of topics. We know we are constantly learning, and we hope you decide to hop on this journey with us!

title: Navigating the Work Compass
description: Over the past 23 months, our lives have changed dramatically, particular in the workplace. Many of us went from spending five days a week in an office, running from airport to airport, or meeting to meeting, to a completely remote environment juggling both our personal and professional lives from a dining room table. With women, in particular women of color, disproportionately impacted during the pandemic (more than 5mm women have exited the workforce since February 2020), what does a “return to the office” look like for you? What are the range of emotions and feelings about going back to work? Has your company addressed various situations of home-based, on-site or hybrid? Or put in place a timeline or new policies? What questions should you be asking? Is flexibility a concern, or lack of it? What changes can I make in how I manage that will support the diverse needs of my teams? Are we ready? Join the new weekly series “Navigating the Work Compass” by Cate Luzio, Founder and CEO of Luminary and Susan E. Chapman-Hughes, Founder, C-Level Exec, Independent Board Director, and hear how they, along with other leaders, are navigating through uncertainty, planning their return to the office and are working to support flexible policies for women.

title: HVK Stevens | The Private Client Series
description:
Jeroen Peters
Jeroen Peters houdt zich bezig met fiscaal recht op het snijvlak van (inter)nationale inkomstenbelasting, estate planning en complexe vennootschapsrechtelijke transacties, beleggingsstructuren, goede doelen, privacy en vermogensoverdracht en herstructureringen. Hij werkt voor nationale en internationale families, ondernemers en zakelijke cliënten. Breed opgeleid als generalist heeft hij zich tijdens zijn carrière steeds verder gespecialiseerd op het gebied van private clients en alle onderwerpen waar zij mee te maken krijgen. 

Jeroen is sinds 2019 als Tax partner aan HVK Stevens verbonden. 

HVK Stevens
HVK Stevens richt zich op de advisering aan ondernemers, vennootschappen, private equity fondsen, goede doelen, vermogende particulieren, families, familiebedrijven. HVK Stevens is een gespecialiseerd boutique kantoor met meer dan 70 medewerkers op het gebied van tax, legal en consultancy. Het kantoor hanteert een integrale aanpak: de specialisten van HVK Stevens werken in multidisciplinaire teams samen aan een oplossing op maat. Het opbouwen van een persoonlijke relatie met de cliënt staat daarbij voorop.

Complexe materie op een eenvoudige manier uitleggen is een kunst die de specialisten bij HVK Stevens verstaan. Cliënten krijgen geen lange, theoretische uiteenzettingen, maar een concrete oplossing voor hun probleem in heldere taal.

description: Tim Joiner is an entrepreneur, focused on growth, who's ready to level-up his effectiveness as a communicator. title: The Sweaty Palms Podcast
description: Hi everyone, I'm Zoë, and welcome to the Sweaty Palms Podcast. Sweaty Palms is a music industry podcast I started in my final semester of college. I was studying music business at the time and wanted to work in the industry after graduating, but wasn't exactly sure what I wanted to do. So, this podcast became a resource for me that morphed into a passion project. You might be wondering why I named the podcast Sweaty Palms. Well, it's because when I get nervous, my hands sweat, and I tend to get nervous in social settings, like talking to people. Sometimes it's endearing, or at least that's what I tell myself. Through this process, I’ve fallen in love with interviewing people, which I guess was a happy accident. If you're interested in listening each week, you'll hear from people who work in this industry, whether it’s musicians, tour managers, talent buyers, venue owners, songwriters, and more. I'm happy to have you here, and thanks for listening. If you want to keep up with me and hear more updates follow me on Instagram @sweatypalmspodcast.

Portia is a high earning 6 figure entrepreneur who is passionate about helping other females reach their highest potential not only in their career but in their overall mental and physical wellbeing. Portia's main focus is to help African American females overcome limiting beliefs through thought work in order to make their vision a reality. title: Ground Up Developers
description:
Learn how to invest in various types of residential real estate projects, including new construction, fix-and-flips, long-term rentals, and Airbnbs. There's no need for prior knowledge; we're here to teach you the real estate game from the ground up. By listening to this podcast, you can save yourself from unnecessary mistakes and stress that come from a lack of knowledge. You'll learn the ins-and-outs of real estate investing, even if you're starting from ground zero.  

Throughout the show, we will bring in licensed professionals (general contractors, realtors, architects, etc.) to learn specific tips and tricks that will save you money and raise your profit on every project. 

This podcast is run by Ernest and Anthony Aguilar, a father-and-son duo. With 20+ years of residential real estate experience, they will be teaching you the ins-and-outs of real estate investing so that you can build your real estate portfolio from the ground up. We'll be teaching simple and complex concepts, all in an easy-to-understand manner.

Follow us, and let's build wealth together.

title: The Zenpreneur Podcast
description:
Welcome to the Zenpreneur Podcast, your sanctuary for achieving entrepreneurial success without the burnout.

Hosted by Mario Lanzarotti, this is the go-to show for entrepreneurs who aspire to create wealth, make an impact, and maintain a harmonious balance in life.

Each week, we delve into enlightening conversations with global business leaders who've mastered the art of blending high performance with inner peace. They've walked the path, faced the challenges, and are here to share their insights, strategies, and habits that have helped them grow their businesses while staying grounded.

Join us as we explore topics like mindful leadership, holistic business practices, preventing burnout, and personal growth. We're not just about making more money; we're about making a difference and living an extraordinary life without compromising on peace and joy.

Tune in to the Zenpreneur Podcast and embark on a journey towards achieving entrepreneurial success, inner peace, and freedom.

If you’re a black woman seeking relatable stories, honest conversations, and actionable insight as you build your business—you’re in the right place, boo. Pop this in your ears, press play, and be prepared to scream “oh, hell yes!”

title: Talks with T
description: The Talks with T Podcast was born of a desire to drive an impact with the next generation & highlight entrepreneurship as a real possibility for anybody. We cover the highs, lows and everything in between in the life of entrepreneurs in MENA. Between 2020 and 2040, about 127 million young people will enter the labour force in MENA, potentially creating an unemployment rate of 23 per cent (amongst the highest in the world). We hope we can create the belief that anybody with the right mindset, persistence and big idea can become an entrepreneur. As a result, these entrepreneurs will create jobs and do their part at chipping away at one of highest youth unemployment rates in the world. Fasten your seatbelts & join the ride!

title: Het online platform voor fietsend Nederland
description:
Ik ben Leo Steijn en vindt dat we een slag te maken hebben in onze branche. Er is nog veel oud denken. Als ondernemers mogen we gaan ondernemen. En allen gaat snel maar samen kom je verder.

Ik zet me er graag voor in. Ik wil graag samen verder komen er gebeurd veel en er staat veel te gebeuren in en rond onze branche. Personeel (met namen monteurs) en winkels verdwijnen. Als klant wil je gewoon graag geholpen worden door een monteur die je fiets kan maken. Dat hij het probleem oplost waar en wanneer jij dat wil.

Het online platform voor fietsend Nederland fietsreparatie.nu de ideale match tussen de fietser en de fietsenmaker en een online leeromgeving. Veel instrcutie, uitleg en gereedschap video's vindt je op ons YouTube kanaal vraagdefietsenmaker

On our podcast, we offer tips for Amazon sellers on everything from how to understand why Amazon suspends people in the first place, to specific ways to avoid suspensions, appeal them, and get reinstated quickly. 

https://www.appealwizards.com/

Our city is buzzing with Innovation and creativity that is changing the world one entrepreneur at a time. This podcast will tell the stories of entrepreneur’s lives and the businesses they have built or building. Our guests are sharing their journey in an organic conversation with our host that starts from their initial inspiration, zooming in on the problem and looking to the future. title: FASHION LAW PODCAST
description:
Te doy la bienvenida a THE FASHION LAW PODCAST, el podcast de Derecho de la moda y Fashion Law Classroom

Soy Pame Echeverría, creadora de la cuenta de Instagram @derechodelamoda y del Fashion Law Classroom, primera escuela online dedicada enteramente a la enseñanza de #fashionlaw para estudiantes y profesionales de Argentina y el mundo

Desde el año 2011 trabajo en derecho de la moda, tanto en el ejercicio profesional como en el ámbito académico, formando profesionales de la industria como del derecho

En el año 2015, fui invitada por Susan Scafidi para ser la única expositora argentina en el evento anual del Fashion Law Institute en la Ciudad de Nueva York y en el 2021, Derecho de la Moda llego a la Facultad de Derecho de la Universidad de Buenos Aires, donde dicto la primera materia de grado en derecho de la moda de la Argentina

Si sos amante de la moda y el derecho, este es tu podcast!

A lo largo de los episodios, te invito a recorrer esta fascinante disciplina y caminar esta pasarela del derecho de la moda juntos

title: #DefendDemocracy Podcast Series
description:
Autocrats thrive when the free world is divided. We’ve seen what happens when the United States retreats from the world, and the world’s democracies start to put narrow interests ahead of values. Democracy around the world begins to decay. 
Our podcast series aims to provide front-line figures in the battle for freedom and democracy a global platform. 

The Alliance of Democracies Foundation is a non-profit organization founded in 2017 by Anders Fogh Rasmussen, the former NATO Secretary General and former Prime Minister of Denmark. The vision of the Alliance of Democracies Foundation is to become the world’s leading “megaphone” for the cause of democracy. We do this through three programs: The Copenhagen Democracy Summit, The Expeditionary Economics Program and The Campaign for Democracy.

title: The Bright Light Podcast
description:
The Bright Light podcast was created to encourage you to stop dimming your light and help to empower your true, authentic self. 

I am your host, Ali, and I am an intuitive coach, healer, and medium. I created this podcast so listeners could have a safe space to let their guard down and get in touch with their true selves. 

I was the biggest people pleaser who matched my energy to those around me because I thought that was the way to figure out what made me happy. Turns out, I just needed to get in touch with who I truly am and what I desire in this life. Now I am no longer a people pleaser, and am able to live my life more authentically to who I am. 

I have created my business through using my intuitive abilities to help others realize who tf they are. I am taking you through the lessons I have learned throughout this journey and the lessons I have yet to learn.

If you are looking for a podcast that is raw, real, full of love, acceptance, and life lessons, you've found it. Thank you for being on this journey with me.

description:
Welcome to our podcast, where we explore the intersection of marketing, motherhood, and mindset!

In this podcast, we delve into the challenges and opportunities that arise when juggling a career in marketing with the joys and demands of motherhood. We'll explore the strategies, tips, and techniques that successful marketers have used to build their careers while balancing family life.

We'll also discuss the importance of mindset in achieving success in both areas of life. We'll cover topics such as overcoming imposter syndrome, developing a growth mindset, and cultivating self-care practices that support your mental and emotional well-being.

Our guests are inspiring mothers and marketing experts who will share their personal experiences, insights, and expertise. Whether you're a marketing professional or a stay-at-home mom, this podcast is for anyone looking to improve their mindset, excel in their career, and find balance between work and family.

So join us for lively conversations, valuable insights, and practical tips that will help you thrive in your career and your family life!

Change your mindset, change your life. YOU CAN live the life you want, YOU CAN design it, create it and start living it. It starts with your mindset, you have to move past your fears, self-limiting beliefs, self doubts, and other people's opinions of you. 

I know YOU CAN, I know it because i've done it. There was a time I lived my fear, self doubts, and self limiting beliefs. Fortunately, I learned to move past them and start living the life I used to only dream about. Now I want to help you do the same

title: All Things Croatia
description: Hey everyone! I'm Stanko Zovak and your host of the All Things Croatia podcast. Growing up as a member of the Croatian diaspora in Los Angeles, I was always involved in the community but wanted to do more. One year ago I made the choice to quit my job and move to Zagreb where I'm studying the Croatian language and now focusing my efforts on this podcast. With this weekly series, I want to connect the global Croatian community and allow people to share stories, learn about new ventures, and discover "All Things Croatia" as I talk (in English) with people both in the Homeland and around the globe who have connections to Croatia. You'll hear from the latest startups, returning diaspora, influencers, Olympians (believe it!), musicians, app developers, tour guides, artists, athletes, and the biggest Croatian celebrities that will return my calls! I hope you enjoy these weekly episodes as much as I do while recording them, and thanks so much for your support! Follow on Instagram at @allthingscroatiapodcast for more content and videos!

description:

This first season has eight exciting episodes exploring how some enterprises in Africa are working towards impact and sustainability. We will look into the tools they use, the challenges they face, how they adapt their pricing, marketing, distribution to commercially reach a growing market of more than 2,5 billion people -  with a positive impact!

The research and deliver were done by the talented Nova SBE Grad students of Prof. Filipe Alfaiate in his course “Leading Impact Enterprises in International Development”, as their final assignment. They did outstanding work. And the best six podcasts from the past 2 years are at the center of this Series and its debates with Prof. Filipe Alfaiate and TA Dr. Daniela Afonso.

Trish realises that it's a privilege being able to spend her days with passionate women in their respective fields. The knowledge each of these women share in the short time they have together is incredibly inspiring, and deserves to be shared with a wider audience. So, here we are. From thought provoking conversations, to personal life stories, and everything in between, Trish can’t wait to introduce you to some of the beautiful women who have inspired her along the way.

Having seen the remarkable results of the Diversity & Inclusion initiatives among the organisations they work with, Executive Search consultancy 6 Group decided to build on this success and share inspiring stories to facilitate sharing of best practices and, most importantly, to show how many inspiring female role models are out there. 

In this monthly Podcast hosted by Anna Gromadzka, we are reaching out to women who, like us, are passionate about improving diversity and inclusion across organisations, and who are willing to share their own success stories, to motivate and support other women currently in leaership roles or aspiring to achieve the same career paths.

title: Liderazgo de Zero a 100
description:
Hola somos Gino y Cristy amamos servir a esta generación de jóvenes y nuestro corazón arde por ver grupos de jóvenes crecientes en todas las áreas tanto en espiritualidad, número y conocimiento.

Una vez dicho esto queremos darles la bienvenidos a esta cuenta “Liderazgo de Zero 100” donde estaremos subiendo contendido de liderazgo juvenil, así que si eres pastor de jóvenes, líder de jóvenes, parte del equipo del liderazgo juvenil de tu iglesia, o estás interesado en servir algún día en esta área de jóvenes, esto es para ti ⚡️⚡️⚡️

Creemos en la importancia de la capacitación para desarrollarnos con excelencia en el area del liderazgo juvenil por una sencilla razón, Dios merece lo mejor 🙌🏼

Actualmente tenemos el honor y privilegio de servir en dos grupos de jóvenes, Uno Youth SD y TJ 🇲🇽 🇺🇸 de La Roca donde hemos crecido y aprendido tanto acerca de este tema de liderazgo = a servicio a las personas!

Gracias por ser parte de esta comunidad, estamos seguros de que Dios sumará algo a tu vida a través de este contenido, otra vez bienvenidos y que disfruten del viaje 🚀.

title: The Unconventionall Podcast
description:
Inspired by the world of neurodiversity and with a genuine desire to see the world evolve, we speak to incredible people with real-world stories. Our world can be a cruel place where diverse individuals, with amazing abilities, are being judged for not fitting the mold. 

Society wants to put us in a box, making us easier to control and understand in a world designed to influence us towards a specific agenda. I have been exposed to a world since the birth of our son that is unlike anything I'd ever seen... And I am so grateful for it.

What's Out is now focusing on producing original content while still showcasing  
and interviewing our Favorite Creators while branching out to other forms of content like Movies, Shows, Music and Documentaries.

title: People, Planet, Progress - Be SEWstainable!
description:
Essere sostenibili significa adottare uno stile di vita consapevole e responsabile, in cui persone e tecnologie cooperano per il benessere del contesto economico e sociale e nel rispetto dell’ambiente. Partendo da tali presupposti, il cammino verso la sostenibilità si concretizza grazie alla capacità di integrare nella strategia aziendale, nei processi e nelle soluzioni tecnologiche anche driver come la tutela dell’ambiente e il rispetto delle persone, al fine di generare valore in una prospettiva di lungo periodo.

“Be SEWstainable!” è l’approccio di SEW-EURODRIVE per uno sviluppo aziendale a tutela del contesto socio-economico, ma anche una promessa per preservare le risorse energetiche e ridurre gli impatti ambientali attraverso lo sviluppo e la diffusione di tecnologie che tutelino il nostro pianeta. Un impegno quotidiano per la creazione di un futuro sostenibile, contribuendo all’evoluzione del sistema sociale ed economico e tutelando, al tempo stesso, l’ecosistema e le generazioni future.

title: Stranded Technologies Podcast
description:
In this show, we talk about how to accelerate the future by unblocking so-called "stranded technologies" through network states, charter cities and crypto rails.

What are stranded technologies? Think of advanced drugs for longevity, tokenized assets, alternative education, clean low-cost energy or robo-fabrication of buildings.

These technologies exist already. But why don’t we use them yet at scale?

It’s not always for market-related reasons.

The thesis of this podcast is that the adoption of these technologies is often blocked by political obstacles, red tape and overregulation.

Yet the future could be now.

We could already be richer, live longer lives and let robots do more work for us - if we unblock these stranded technologies.

This podcast is not only about the practice of innovation, it is also about ethics: - How can we unblock vast opportunities, while mitigating against the risks?

- How can entrepreneurs overcome obstacles to work on frontiers, while responsible?

- What ethical rules and institutional regulations can guide us on that path? We will discuss these and other questions with entrepreneurs, regulators and industry experts.

Join the community to discuss what’s said in the episodes: Discord: https://discord.gg/Z4H6UjbubK Website: https://www.infinitafund.com/

title: Resilienza Umana e Manageriale, come svilupparla?
description:
In questo percorso approfondiremo insieme cos’è la Resilienza, capacità che sempre più viene citata come fondamentale per l’adattamento umano, e capacità organizzativa distintiva. Con l’aiuto di diversi esperti in molteplici ambiti, attingendo al contributo della psicologia del lavoro e delle organizzazioni, della psicologia positiva, delle neuroscienze e dell’aviazione scopriremo, attraverso i vari podcast, le radici della resilienza. Preparatevi a mettervi in gioco: podcast dopo podcast avrete modo di incontrare approfondimenti specifici e curiosità su cui riflettere e applicazioni pratiche con le quali esercitarvi e allenare sin da subito tutti quanti i pilastri della Resilienza.
Buon ascolto a tutti!

title: Manifest Your Inner CEO
description:
Manifesting Your Inner CEO is all about becoming the very best version of you, throwing the limiting beliefs out of the window and taking a stance to living the life you’ve always dreamt of. 

I was once in a place where I knew I wanted to create so much success for myself but I was stuck in a place where I didn’t even know where to begin, and over the past 10 years of building my own businesses I realised I wasn’t alone with this feeling. 

So I wanted to bring you a space where I share my story with you, just a normal person with big dreams trying to do good along the way, sharing with you the high’s, the low’s and how I overcome them as I move through my journey. We often only see the online successes but we don’t see the offline journey’s on how they got there. 


So if you love all things business, personal development, spirituality & manifestation then this is the podcast for you!

description:
Human Books condivide centinaia di letture.

Sceglieremo un libro al mese al quale daremo una valutazione su 3 criteri: 
1-Chiarezza dei contenuti
2-Originalità dei contenuti
3-Applicabilità

La nostre valutazioni non vogliono essere delle recensioni, bensì il punto di vista di chi porta in campo i temi affrontati nei testi che proponiamo e che valgono come spunti di riflessione.

Vi diremo se queste letture ci sono servite, se ci hanno aiutato a fare meglio quello che facciamo, se siamo cresciuti grazie ad esse. Non vi diremo che questo vale per tutti, non tutti i "cibi mentali" nutrono tutti allo stesso modo.

title: Coinology The Podcast
description: Coinology is the rebirthing of the concept of the Talented Tenth coined in 1903 by black educator and author W.E.B. Du Bois, emphasizing the necessity for higher education to develop the leadership capacity among the most able 10 percent of black Americans. Coinology is forgetting the higher education component and focusing on the skills and techniques among the most able 10 percent of 21st century black Americans. Ebony Porter-Ike, the Certified Deal Closer, created Coinology: The Podcast, to redefine the definition of the Talented Tenth, and invites her peers and audience to join her on an impactful and educational journey of navigating entrepreneurship. Follow Coinology: The Podcast (@coinology) Follow Ebony Porter-Ike @epimediagroup

title: Happily Ever Understood
description:
Imagine this world an even better place if we aim to understand its people's stories. Seeking to understand favors curiosity, patience, open-mindedness, and empathy. There is an absence of judgment and a desire to see things from others’ points of view, to see their reasons, and feel what they feel.

The more we seek understanding, the better we can craft our work. The better our work, the more likely we are to positively impact this world. Understanding is also a way to access knowledge, and knowledge is power. If you want to build a better place, start with listening. That is not all! Because if you listen well and try to understand all sides, you will find that you have so much more than your own story. Because in this world of ours that is so small and so fragile, we are bound together by stories. In such a world, curiosity, patience, open-mindedness, and empathy would be highly valued qualities. People would recognize the power of understanding and would actively strive to cultivate these qualities within themselves and their communities. By embracing the richness of diverse stories, this world would become a more harmonious and inclusive place, where every individual's experiences and perspectives are acknowledged and respected.

title: Cutting Through The Noise
description: Join Australian business women, Nadine Johns-Alcock, Stephanie Mason, and Hayley Mears as they explore the new business landscape in a post-pandemic world. They will take a deep dive into the disruption and changes across digital marketing, the supply chain, the influence of culture in business and the latest news in tech.

title: REFLEXIONES: Para seguir adelante en tiempos difíciles
description:
Durante casi dos años estuve perdido sin saber como volver a reconectar con la vida.
Durante ese tiempo me la pasaba viendo mi celular y leyendo frases que me daban energía unos minutos, talvez unas horas para después volver a postrarme en cama. 
Hoy cuando me levanto y siento el miedo, el coraje y la frustración, lo transformo en acción, en fuerza para seguir. En este audio no pretendo enseñar nada, solo deseo compartir con ustedes las frases que cada día me ayudaron a sentirme un poco mejor, profundizando en ellas y esperando que así como a mi, a ustedes también les sirva para seguir adelante.

description: Welcome to The Tumbleweed Podcast, where we discuss an eclectic range of topics including Business, Design, Texas Culture, and everything in between. We're two teachers who turned a side hustle into a nationally known apparel brand, and now we work with some of the biggest names in Texas. We strive to never stop exploring, and continue to draw inspiration from our adventures. So drift and explore or raise a glass; we're always ready to hang out and talk about the things that we love. So come come roll with us - as we drift and explore.

title: Amplify with Purpose: Business & Life Unlocked
description:
🎙️ Amplify with Purpose: Business & Life Unlocked 🎙️

Feeling stuck in the business merry-go-round? Welcome to Amplify with Purpose: Business & Life Unlocked, where we rip off the bandages of mediocrity and inject purpose into every artery of your business and life.

We’re all about creating memorable experiences, building unbeatable loyalty, and delivering the wow factor in every interaction. But let's not just talk the talk; we'll give you actionable strategies that won't just fill your notebook but will transform you into a dynamo of excellence.

Your host? A seasoned international business strategist who's worked across the globe, from the wild terrains of Africa to the bustling streets of Australia. With over 20 years of battle-hardened experience in business optimization and customer experience, the wisdom poured into each episode will leave you feeling like you've just downed an espresso shot of business brilliance.

Every episode is a masterclass in practicality, blending global best practices with the wisdom of behavioral economics, so you can turn those lofty theories into your everyday wins. Think of us as your Sherlock to your Watson; we set you up for the "ah-ha" moments, you get the glory.

This podcast is your key to unlock sustainable business growth, riveting customer experiences, and a life lived to the fullest. No fluff, no buzzwords—just transformative insights you can implement today. Prepare to Amplify with Purpose and become the hero of your own story.

#AmplifyWithPurpose #BusinessUnlocked #LifeUnlocked #CustomerExperience #BusinessGrowth #LeadershipMastery #UnlockPotential

Enjoy !

title: The BarberShop with Shantanu
description:
Hi, thanks for stopping by! 

My name is Shantanu and I am the founder of Bombay Shaving Company and Bombae. My company has scaled to 1500+ Cr value (if this metric means anything haha), but more importantly, is a loved personal care brand which has scaled to 50L households and 1L stores in 5 years.

The BarberShop was started with a clear thesis - India needs to create approximately a million jobs a month, currently, we create almost two hundred thousand. Our ‘Funda’ is to simplify entrepreneurship and make it accessible to everyone in the country so we inculcate an enterprising habit in the 23-24 year old of today.

After the love received by S1, we have decided to go beyond conversations on our podcast to tangible help. With the help of our sponsors at BSC and Bombae we have put together a season which brings together a corpus of 50+ equity seekers looking to support 20+ start-ups in their growth and success.

title: MISSIO
description:
MISSIO on Miss Helsinki New Eran tuottama podcast, jossa keskitytään business ajatteluun, yrittäjyyteen sekä oman menestystarinan rakentamiseen. 

”Pohdimme pitkään miten saamme välitettyä arvokkaita koulutuksiamme eteenpäin seuraajille, hengessä mukana eläjille sekä koulutus aiheista kiinnostuneille. Tämän ajatuksen kautta syntyi MISSIO podcast.” 

MISSIO on kanava jota kautta pääset itse asian ytimeen. Kuulijat pääsevät inspiroitumaan, oppimaan sekä viihtymään. Miss Helsinki New Eran kilpailijat sekä kouluttajat  saapuvat vieraaksi puimaan koulutusjakson aiheita sekä kuinka kilpailijat suoriutuivat suurista, vastuullisista ja haastavista projekteista. Kilpailijat kertovat omin sanoin mitä oppivat, olisiko jotain kannattanut ehkä tehdä toisin ja mitä ei kannata missään nimessä tehdä. 

Oletko kuullut sanonnasta, että rakentaessasi oman elämän menestystarinaan kerää lähellesi inspiroivia, määrätietoisia, ahkeria ja kannustavia henkilöitä.
Tervetuloa Mission seuraan !

Laadukkaan podcast tuotannon takana Podcastory.

The War Room Podcast includes interviews with key people and no nonsense straight from the hip changes you can make in your life to grow and achieve your goals and dreams. The War Room Podcast will help you realize the common denominator in all your problems. Dallas quotes "the most powerful tool in the world is the mirror, should you choose to look into it". My approach is straightforward and efficient - like a strong cup of coffee. Each episode focuses on a relevant topic or idea, presented in a conversational format, to wrap up in 15 minutes or less.
