title: Localization Fireside Chat
description:
Welcome to our captivating podcast channel, where knowledge comes to life and ideas soar beyond imagination. Prepare to embark on a thrilling intellectual journey as we delve deep into the realms of thought-provoking discussions, uncovering the secrets of our ever-evolving world, with a special focus on the fascinating Localization Industry.

Join us as we explore the vast expanse of human knowledge, touching upon a multitude of topics that captivate the mind and invigorate the soul, including the dynamic world of localization. Our dedicated team of passionate experts thought leaders, and visionaries have come together to curate an exceptional auditory experience like no other, where we illuminate the intricacies and nuances of the Localization Industry.

Within the realm of localization, we unravel the complexities of bridging language and cultural gaps, ensuring that businesses and individuals can communicate and connect on a global scale. From the cultural adaptation of marketing campaigns to the localization of software and websites, we dive into the art and science of making content resonate with diverse audiences worldwide.

Discover the power of storytelling as we weave narratives that transport you to extraordinary realms, where history, science, and culture intertwine with the localization industry. Through meticulously crafted episodes, we breathe life into the pivotal moments that have shaped the industry, explore the latest technological advancements, and shed light on the remarkable achievements of localization pioneers.

Beyond mere information, we strive to ignite your curiosity and fuel your thirst for knowledge within the realm of localization. Our captivating episodes are designed to leave an indelible mark, stimulating your intellect and fostering a deep connection with the intricacies of this vibrant field. Immerse yourself in the sheer joy of learning as we present complex ideas in an accessible and engaging manner, catering to both industry professionals and those new to the world of localization.

Our podcast channel is not just a passive listening experience; it's an invitation to be an active participant in a global community of localization enthusiasts. Engage with us through social media platforms, where you can share your thoughts, pose questions, and engage in enriching discussions with fellow listeners. We cherish the diversity of perspectives and believe in the transformative power of dialogue, allowing us to collectively broaden our horizons and uncover new insights within the localization industry.

Enrich your Localization career or interest with the wisdom imparted by our distinguished guests, including industry experts, localization practitioners, and entrepreneurs who have revolutionized the way we connect across languages and cultures. Their stories will inspire you, challenge your preconceptions, and encourage you to push the boundaries of innovation within the localization field. By embracing the power of their narratives, you'll discover that the Localization Industry is a thriving ecosystem of creativity, problem-solving, and endless opportunities.

Subscribe now to our podcast channel and embark on an extraordinary expedition of intellectual discovery, with a dedicated focus on the captivating Localization Industry. Open your mind, embrace the power of knowledge, and let our captivating voices guide you on an unforgettable quest for wisdom, understanding, and excellence in the world of localization. The adventure begins here.

Contact info L10Nfiresidechat@gmail.com

title: ONUS Mission - Making Business Beautiful
description:
ONUS mission is a fully fledged innovative media platform focused on Making Business Beautiful by fusing it with Art & Culture.
We serve as a facilitator to businesses and start-ups to make their challenging path less complicated, expanding their reach and supporting them with our collaborative network and counsel.

Nothing stays the same in this always changing world, especially business which is changing faster than ever thanks to globalization and advancements in technology.

Business is generally seen as unattractive by people that are not from the sector, as full with complicated numbers and graphs and not as simple and visually compelling.

To succeed in this new reality, we need to make people more aware of the beauty of business by presenting it simply and creatively, reaching a much greater audience and inspiring them in a sustainable way.

Many people strive to create value and leave a positive impact in this challenging environment, some working without being noticed and achieving little small things with a potential to turn to great scalable things in the future, others working as leaders of big established companies and facing the everyday challenge of keeping the company great consistently.

Our mission is to bring these cases in the spotlight and inspire others with positive role model stories in whom to refer to follow their calling in life and achieve their dreams, by creating an inclusive, diverse and fluid collaborative community connecting together people, planet and purpose through regenerative circular business models and conscious leadership.

“ON US mission” meaning: the mission to bring the best ON US from a business perspective and make it more beautiful by fusing it with art and culture.

Be part of ONUS mission and start following your dreams now.
Move before you are ready and dive in the beautiful world of business.

title: How to NOT Execute Your Strategy (and what to do about it)
description:
“…on average, 95% of a company’s employees are unaware of, or do not understand, its strategy”

(From Harvard Business Review, October, 2005, by Robert S. Kaplan and David P. Norton)

Which begs the question: If so many people are not following the actual strategy, what are they executing?

The simple answer is that they are making up their own strategies. Or worse, they are undoing the original strategy.

Come listen as we dive into the biggest lessons learned from the people who own strategic execution – the senior leaders who live in the center of it.

title: The Conscious Capitalist's Journey
description:
Welcome to "The Conscious Capitalist's Journey", a podcast that takes you on a transformative journey of entrepreneurship, real estate investing, and conscious capitalism. Your host, Chris, an entrepreneur born in Hawaii from immigrant parents started 10 businesses and failed - Then succeeded with three. Today, he has multiple streams of income. Through his journey, he inspires us all to believe that financial freedom is possible with the right mindset.

Join Chris on a wild and honest journey as he breaks free from an 80-hour-a-week job in Japan and takes the leap into entrepreneurship. From investing in stocks and crypto to losing a lot of money, yet gaining valuable lessons from the school of hard knocks, Chris shares his raw and crazy experiences. He delves into how real estate investing completely changed the game for him, utilizing his background in finance to start creating wealth and achieve financial freedom. Follow his path and learn how you too can attain life-changing wealth for generations to come by investing in apartment buildings with him.

A key aspect of this podcast is that Chris is currently on his journey towards financial freedom and still considers himself in the "rat race". Regardless, he continues on his pursuit of knowledge: To learn and develop new mindsets, strategies, skills, and investment techniques that can help him and others get out of it.

Throughout his journey, including his successes and failures, Chris aims to share his experiences and inspire his listeners to understand that the road to success is often filled with obstacles and challenges. Listeners can learn and grow together, gaining insights and inspiration to achieve their own financial goals and pursue success despite the darkness that may come their way.

The core of his work and lifestyle is conscious capitalism, which is a practice of investing and managing money with a focus on creating positive social and environmental outcomes, in addition to financial returns.

"The Conscious Capitalist's Journey" is not just about becoming financially free, but also becoming the most giving person you can be, all the while enjoying the fruits of your labor.

This podcast speaks to aspiring entrepreneurs who are working jobs that they hate, creatives who struggle to make money but want to pursue their dreams and passions, children of immigrant parents, and parents who want to buy back their time. Chris's mission is to inspire a mindset change and address problems of financial and mental poverty, helping listeners on their journey towards overcoming debt and achieving their financial goals.

Join Chris on "The Conscious Capitalist's Journey" and let him inspire you to create generational wealth and make a positive impact in the world.

title: Bits of New York
description:
Welcome to our Bits of New York Podcast, where we deep dive into the world of Bitcoin and discuss the latest happenings and opportunities this new technology brings to New York State.

Like any new technology, there is always a learning curve. We aim to assist you and introduce you to people who believe in this new tech. We'll interview experts, entrepreneurs, educators, and industry insiders to share their insights and perspectives on the rapidly evolving world of Bitcoin. In this podcast, we'll cover everything from basic knowledge and regulations to innovative startups and help you stay informed and updated on the latest Bitcoin happenings in New York.

So, whether you're a long-time Bitcoin enthusiast or just getting started, sit back, relax, and join us for an exciting journey into the world of Bitcoin in New York.

Who are we? We are your hosts Kelly and Matt Lewis. We ran a successful small business in New York State for 15 years and love hearing the stories of fellow entrepreneurs.

title: Everyday Hustle by Hustlemob
description:
Welcome to Everyday Hustle by Hustlemob, the podcast for early stage side hustlers looking to take their businesses to the next level. If you're an entrepreneur in the making, this show is for you.

Join us every week as we dive into the nitty-gritty details of starting and growing a successful side hustle. Our expert guests will share their experiences and insights on how to avoid common pitfalls, move faster towards your goals, and build better businesses to provide for your families.

Whether you're struggling with finding the right business idea, dealing with the challenges of balancing your side hustle with your day job, or looking for tips on how to market your business, we've got you covered. We'll help you overcome the obstacles you're facing and give you the tools and strategies you need to succeed.

So tune in to Everyday Hustle by Hustlemob, and let us help you turn your side hustle into a thriving business.

title: Bold Moves: How Did You Know?
description:
Welcome to the “Bold Moves: How Did You Know?” podcast.

Hello to the naturally curious and to you who wants to learn more about people, their inner workings, their trials and tribulations, and their bold moves because you know that through their stories you’ll be inspired to pursue YOUR greatest achievements.

I’m Kristen Rocco and the host of this podcast as well as the founder of a content consulting business (KristenRocco.com) and a love storytelling company called Love Notery (lovenotery.com).

I started this podcast to inspire you to make bold moves. I have a hypothesis that people feel a deeper sense of life fulfillment and satisfaction when they make bold moves.

In these podcast episodes, you’ll hear bold move stories that propelled my guests from curiosity to action. And understand that doing that thing you’ve wanted to do isn’t more than making a decision and being courageous. I think there’s a gap in the way these stories are being told today. There are many stories about what someone is doing and why they’re doing it but rarely focus on the how.

That’s when my podcast name came to me. "Bold Moves: How Did You Know?"

How did you know you wanted to start a business? Advocate for change? Pursue your dream? Beneath it all is the answer to the question: How did you know you could do it?

I'll underscore the traits and behaviors it took for these leaders to go from their idea to actually doing it. And together, we’ll see if my hypothesis is right. Does making a bold move help you feel fulfilled and satisfied?

Subscribe to this podcast so you’re the first to know when a new episode is out!

title: Biz Talks with Kevin Pheley - Small Business Tips for Success
description:
Welcome to Biz Talks with Kevin Pheley, hosted by entrepreneur Kevin Pheley, who has built multiple multi-million dollar companies. Our podcast provides practical insights and tips to help small business owners start, grow, and scale their businesses.

As a small business owner, you know that the journey of entrepreneurship can be challenging, but our podcast is designed to provide educational and motivational content to inspire and guide you. Our podcast covers a wide range of topics related to business, including marketing, sales, finance, leadership, and more.

One of the key focuses of our podcast is marketing, and Kevin's expertise in social media paid ads is a valuable asset for small business owners looking to create effective marketing campaigns. Additionally, his experience in hiring and training large teams provides valuable insights into building and managing a successful team.

We also feature interviews with successful entrepreneurs who share their experiences, challenges, and lessons learned. With our guests' practical insights and tips, you'll have the tools to apply to your own business.

Our podcast is designed to reach a wide audience of small business owners and entrepreneurs looking for valuable insights and guidance. By sharing motivational and educational content, we hope to help small business owners overcome challenges, achieve success, and grow their businesses.

Join us for Biz Talks with Kevin Pheley and learn from Kevin's expertise and our guests' experiences.

Follow Kevin on social media:

instagram.com/kevinpheley

kevinpheley.com

title: "Did You Know?" with Joe & Joe
description:
Are you ready to learn something new about the spirits industry? Then you won't want to miss our bourbon-inspired audio podcast, "Did You Know?" with Joe & Joe! Hosted by the dynamic duo of Joe Vitale and Joe Gumeny, from the video podcast of Suburban Bourbon, this 30-minute show is a deep dive into the world of spirits, answering your most burning questions from the experts we interview. From restaurateurs to owners of taverns and leaders in the spirit industry, we're bringing you the insights and knowledge you've been craving.

Unlike our video podcast, Suburban Bourbon, this audio-only experience allows you to take in the knowledge while on-the-go or when you want to give your eyes a break from the screen. Whether you're a seasoned industry pro or a curious beginner, "Did You Know?" with Joe & Joe is the perfect blend of entertainment and education. Whether you've always wondered how your favorite restaurant got its start or you're interested in the latest trends in the spirits world, our audio podcast is the perfect way to get the scoop straight from the experts.

So sit back and get ready to hear the answers to the questions you've always wanted to ask. From behind-the-scenes stories to industry secrets and everything in between, our podcast is your all-access pass to the world of hospitality and spirits. Join us as we explore this exciting and ever-evolving industry together!

title: Entresophy - Ramblings on Entrepreneurship and Philosophy
description:
Episode edited and transcription generated with www.koolio.ai

Join us on our podcasts as we dive into the fascinating world of "Entresophy" [entirely our term!] - the intersection of entrepreneurship and philosophy. Drawing from our personal experiences in the tech industry and our upbringing in Sanatana Dharma philosophy and spirituality, we explore how these two fields can enrich and inform each other. We discuss the importance of self-reflection, risk-taking, and ethical considerations in entrepreneurship, and how incorporating spiritual teachings can offer a unique perspective on finding balance and harmony in our actions. From navigating the constantly evolving landscape of technology to finding purpose beyond just financial success, we delve into the big questions and share our insights on how Entresophy can help shape us as individuals and society.

title: The Real Estate Templet Podcast
description:
Welcome to The Real Estate Templet podcast, where we sit down with real estate professionals from around the world and in our local community, as well as local authorities, to hear their stories and learn from their experiences in the industry.

Join us as we chat with real estate agents, investors, developers, and other experts who have made a name for themselves in real estate. We'll dive into their background, their journey to success, and the strategies and tactics they used to get there.

But we won't just stop there. We'll also be talking to local authorities such as the police chief, the mayor, and others to get their insights into the real estate industry and the impact it has on our community.

Whether you're a real estate professional, a local business owner, or just interested in the industry, there's always something to learn from the experiences of others. We'll cover a range of topics, from marketing and lead generation to deal structuring and negotiation, and everything in between.

So grab a cup of coffee and join us for some insightful conversations with some of the brightest minds in real estate and local authorities. Tune in to The Real Estate Templet podcast and start taking your real estate career and community involvement to the next level!

description: Welcome to "Defy the Odds", the podcast that inspires you to overcome obstacles in life and do things that make you uncomfortable. This podcast brings you extraordinary stories from everyday people who have defied the odds to achieve their dreams. Whether in business, sneakers, culture or life in general, our guests share their valuable insights on overcoming their struggles. Through their personal experiences, they offer practical advice, motivational tips and inspiring stories about how to break through the barriers that hold us back. Along with the guests, our host will explore a variety of themes such as resilience, perseverance, self-discipline, entrepreneurship and much more. So, if you're looking for a podcast that motivates you to be your best version of yourself, join us and "Defy the Odds". Get ready to be inspired, uplifted and empowered to take on whatever challenges life throws your way. Tune in to our latest episodes every week on your favorite podcast platform.

title: No Big Deal : A Sales Podcast
description:
We know what you’re all thinking… when will there be a podcast about the ups and downs of landing that huge, career-defining sale?!

Well, have we got a podcast for you?

Sales is a results business. Behind every done deal is a story of leads, losses and countless twists and turns.

No Big Deal welcomes sales people from every industry to unzip their gilet and spill the beans on their biggest sale to date.

With conversations on topics such as Entrepreneurship, Leadership, Personal Development, Generational Wealth and more; The Art of Kings Podcast will help you take control of your life and become the man that you were meant to be.

title: HOW TO COMPLAIN AND WIN
description:
We live at a time where the level of customer service we receive, especially from large companies, is appalling.

To get to speak to a human being is almost impossible.

In this podcast, I am interviewing informed individuals who have beaten the system and gained compensation, apologies, and bonuses from British Airways, EON, British Telecom, and many other large and small organizations.

They are real-life case studies that follow THE GOLDEN RULES of complaining.

These stories are often amusing, always enlightening, and certainly valuable thought-provoking concepts so that you can win.

As a past guest presenter for QVC The Shopping Channel, I sold £millions of pounds of products for major brands.

As their chief sales/presentation coach, I taught others to do the same.

I know how to influence and persuade people to ‘buy’ what I’m selling.

Let me teach you how to complain and get results.

I look forward to sharing these tried and tested processes with you.

title: The Great Connect
description: The Great Connect explores the way we work and live - what works and what doesn't, to truly engage in the human experience. All the while we're preparing for the great paradigm shift to reimagine what could be. This is the Great Connect.

El podcast es presentado por Diego Errázuriz y Andrés Tirado, dos jóvenes que a través de este podcast buscan encapsular y compartir su camino en el que buscan tener un impacto positivo en la sociedad hablando de sus experiencias, ideas y reflexiones que van surgiendo.

title: In Pursuit Of Passion
description:
In pursuit of our passion, it's easy to get lost in the hustle. We live in a time where social media is more than just a tool for our business, it's our lifeline.

In my own experience of building a service based business in the modern world, I hit a point of total confusion, overstimulation, and complete unproductivity that forced me to change the way I approached my marketing.

In the Pursuit of Passion podcast, I share the nitty-gritty behind the scenes details of what building and marketing a successful business looks like WITHOUT sacrificing time or brain cells. No more mindless scrolling on the internet. This podcast shares the strategies and the thought processes behind every move I make in online marketing for my service based business.

We discuss things like setting boundaries in business, what it looks like to achieve your highest self, how to have radical accountability, and the many strategies I use to launch simple, steady and successful marketing campaigns.

Whether you need strategies to help you move the needle forward in your online marketing, or the raw awakening that can set you free from mindless scrolling and comparison of others, I'm here to deliver the good news on how you can stay sane, happy, & motivated in Pursuit of Passion.

Bienvenidas a "Ella"

El podcast para la mujer que decidió tomar el control de su SÍ y su NO! En este podcast exploraremos preguntas profundas y relevantes para todas las mujeres:

¿Quiénes somos cuando ya no hay alguien que nos diga NO? ¿Cómo podemos convertirnos en la mujer que queremos ser? ¿Cómo podemos establecer nuestros propios estándares y definir dónde ponemos la línea entre el SÍ y el NO?

En cada episodio, exploraremos temas que afectan nuestra identidad en todos los aspectos de nuestra vida, desde la familia, el trabajo, los negocios, las relaciones, el contenido, el liderazgo y el sentido de valor propio.

title: Entrepreneur Dive
description: Join us on The Entrepreneur Dive, where we take a deep dive into the world of entrepreneurship. Each episode, we interview successful entrepreneurs from different industries and backgrounds, exploring how they started, grew, and scaled their businesses. Whether you're an aspiring entrepreneur, a seasoned business owner, or simply interested in learning from the best, our guests share their inspiring stories, valuable insights, and practical tips for success. Get ready to dive in and discover the secrets of successful entrepreneurship!

description: Welcome to A Small Business Podcast! This is the show where we dive into the world of entrepreneurship and share the stories, strategies, and insights of successful small business owners. Whether you're just starting out or looking to take your business to the next level, this podcast is for you. Each episode, we'll feature a different guest who has overcome challenges, found success, and is willing to share their secrets with you. So join us on this journey as we explore what it takes to build a thriving small business in today's ever-changing economy.

title: OWN IT. Studio
description:
In this podcast, real estate experts and successful business owners share their knowledge and experience on buying and selling real estate, as well as tips and strategies for growing your real estate business. The podcast covers a wide range of topics, including market trends, property analysis, marketing techniques, negotiation skills, and much more.

Listeners can expect to gain valuable insights and actionable advice on how to succeed in the competitive world of real estate. Whether you're a seasoned real estate professional looking to take your business to the next level, or a newcomer to the industry looking to learn the ropes, this podcast offers something for everyone.

Through interviews with top-performing agents, real estate coaches, and industry leaders, the podcast provides a wealth of information on best practices for building a successful real estate business. It also covers key topics related to buying and selling real estate, such as the home buying and selling process, financing options, and legal considerations.

Whether you're looking to grow your existing real estate business, or just starting out in the industry, this podcast is an excellent resource for learning and staying up-to-date on the latest trends and strategies in the real estate world.

title: Get Real. Get Loud. With Purpose.

title: She Invests
description: This podcast is an educational podcast for investors looking to use real estate as a wealth building strategy. The hosts, Carrie and Allie, discuss many topics related to how to use real estate to increase your personal portfolio and strategies that they use to when investing. The hosts also have guest speakers on their podcast that share their personal experiences with real estate, their strategies, systems that they use, operational advice, and many other topics focused on wealth building through real estate. The hosts also have a Facebook group called She Invests where investors, lenders, agents, or anyone interested in real estate wealth building can join and be apart of the conversations for different deal analysis, fundraising, situational advise, and positive encouragement for real estate professionals.

title: Conversando En Pareja - "No estás Solo"
description:
¡Bienvenidos a nuestro apasionante podcast! 🎙️💡

En cada episodio, esta pareja te sumergirá en cautivadoras conversaciones que exploran una amplia variedad de temas. Desde tecnología y emprendimiento, hasta la crianza de hijos y mucho más, ¡lo abordamos todo!

Descubre una visión auténtica y fácilmente identificable de nuestras vidas a través de nuestras experiencias personales, triunfos y obstáculos. Nuestro podcast te ofrece discusiones animadas y perspicaces que te mantendrán enganchado.

Con valiosas perspectivas, consejos prácticos y anécdotas inspiradoras, buscamos brindarte un contenido relevante y entretenido. Te acompañaremos en tu camino, ya sea que estés buscando inspiración, consejos o simplemente una agradable charla.

Explora el fascinante mundo de la tecnología, el emprendimiento, la crianza de hijos y mucho más con nosotros.

Sintoniza nuestro podcast y únete a la conversación. ¡No te lo pierdas!

#podcast #tecnología #emprendimiento #crianzadehijos #experienciaspersonales #consejos #inspiración #entretenimiento #contenidoauténtico #charlaamena #perspectivas #aprendizaje

title: The Well Exchange
description: Welcome to The Well Exchange! Where we help you unlock Heaven's resources in your life and business. In our podcast, we talk with our friends about how our spiritual reality affects our business, our relationships, and more. We invite you to connect with us at https://www.thewell.exchange/ or on Instagram @thewellexchange.

title: SheFounded
description:
"She Founded" is a podcast that showcases the stories of successful female entrepreneurs and investors. Hosted by a knowledgeable and engaging interviewer, this podcast offers a unique perspective on the challenges and triumphs of women who have taken the leap into the world of entrepreneurship. Each episode features an in-depth interview with a different female founder or investor, who shares insights and advice on how to start and grow a successful business.

Through these candid conversations, listeners gain a behind-the-scenes look at the experiences and strategies that have helped these women build thriving companies and investment portfolios. Whether you're an aspiring entrepreneur, an established business owner, or simply interested in the stories of trailblazing women, "She Founded" is the podcast for you. Tune in to learn from the best and be inspired by their journeys.

description: Welcome to "More than just roommates", a podcast where we explore the journey of entrepreneurship and talk about where we currently are in our lives. We give the RAW behind the scenes of what its like having two kids and running businesses and how those things come in to play in our relationship.

title: Jorge Guglietta
description:
¿Alguna vez has soñado con emprender tu propio negocio gastronómico o mejorar la gestión de tu establecimiento actual?

El podcast que te llevará de la mano en el fascinante mundo de la gerencia gastronómica. Soy Jorge Guglietta, y después de más de 30 años de experiencia en el apasionante universo de la gastronomía y los alimentos y bebidas, estoy aquí para compartir contigo todo mi conocimiento y consejos prácticos acompañado de expertos en el área.

Este es el lugar perfecto para ti., exploraremos juntos las estrategias, las tendencias y los secretos detrás del éxito en la industria de la gastronomía.

Te llevaré a un viaje lleno de sabores, innovación y oportunidades. Descubrirás valiosos consejos gastronómicos, desde la creación de menús irresistibles hasta la gestión eficiente y la optimización de tus operaciones.

title: House Coffee Podcast
description:
Navigating the unknowns and road blocks on the dimly-lit path to fulfilling a creative dream can be frustrating and lonely.

If you’ve ever felt alone in the dark on your small business journey, Maggie Fromm and Rich Sarnacki are friends who know the feeling! They also know that the path can be made a little brighter when a friend offers a candle in the dark.

Often that brightness comes through conversation and the comfort of sharing a cup of coffee with someone who gets it. So let Maggie and Rich pour you a cup!

House Coffee Podcast invites you to join your friends Maggie and Rich as they share stories from their lives as small business owners. The goal? To leave you feeling understood and supported in anything you’re going through as you pursue your own creative dream. Business ownership is never easy! We all need a place to be real about it.

And when you have friends like Maggie and Rich who understand you, commiserate with you and celebrate the wins with you, the path can seem that much brighter.

title: Cambio de Ritmo
description:
Welcome to Cambio de Ritmo's podcast.

Cambio de Ritmo directly translates to “change of rhythm” but in sports, soccer especially, the same phrase would be “change of pace”.

Cambio de ritmo is a phrase I heard a lot growing up, whether it was being advised to me by a coach to include more cambios de ritmo, changes of pace, into my game, or listening to commentators talk about how players like Riquelme, Messi, and Iniesta were masters at doing so.

In my own way of understanding it, a cambio de ritmo is a change of pace and/or direction in one’s movement in order to disrupt and impede the speed and direction the opposing player and team are moving at in order to create distance from one or more of them, to create separation in order to receive a pass from a teammate, or open up space so one can make a pass or take a shot themselves. Along with other things you can imagine.

Changing your pace in the game, whether you have the ball or not, is crucial if you want to simply make any play happen

I’ve experienced lots of “cambios de ritmo”, more-so looking at the translation as “change of rhythm”. My playing career and life as a whole up to this point have gone through many changes of rhythm, sometimes willingly and sometimes not, as I’m sure is true with those of my guests’.

At Cambio de Ritmo, it is believed that these changes are essential in the improvement and sustainability of every athlete both in their sport and life. From having away-from-sport interests and goals to overcoming obstacles in sport, cambios de ritmo are what makes every person who they are.

One thing we know about cambios de ritmo is that they make it very hard for the opposing team to read one's movements and plays. However, this podcast aims to follow our guests' pathway very closely.

On this podcast, we believe that everyone has the potential to make a difference in the world. We strive to bring you valuable insights, practical tips, and inspirational stories from experts and thought leaders to help you achieve your goals and maximize your impact.

Each week, we'll delve into the mindset, habits, and strategies that can help you overcome obstacles and seize opportunities. We'll discuss topics like personal development, leadership, entrepreneurship, social impact, and more. Our goal is to provide you with actionable insights and tools that you can apply to your life and business right away.

We believe that success is not just about achieving your own goals, but also about making a positive impact on others. We'll showcase stories of individuals and businesses that are making a difference in their communities and beyond, and we'll explore how you can do the same.

So whether you're an aspiring entrepreneur, a social activist, or simply someone who wants to live a more fulfilling life, The Holliday Impact is the podcast for you. Join us as we embark on a journey of growth, impact, and transformation.

The host, Sera Evcimen is the Founder of Pratik, a hardware advising and coaching company, passionate about helping builders plan ahead, reduce technical risk and build their hardware venture successfully. Every episode ends with a TL;DL (too long didn't listen) to summarize key takeaways and aid in establishing your next steps in your hardware venture. title: Dansen met de Dood
description:
Stap binnen in een wereld die je diep raakt... Een podcast die je meesleept op een enerverende reis, waarin de grenzen van leven en dood vervagen. Maak kennis met "Dansen met de Dood", dé podcast die afscheid nemen, herinneren en rouwen opnieuw definieert. Ik ben Aisha Krako-Bransen, jouw gids op dit bijzondere avontuur.

In deze buitengewone podcast onthullen we de vele geheimen van het leven en de dood. We graven diep in de betekenis van afscheid nemen, delen verhalen die je hart raken en bieden praktische inzichten die je wereld zullen veranderen. Bereid je voor om emotioneel geraakt te worden en kostbare herinneringen te ontdekken tijdens deze reis.

"Dansen met de Dood" is er voor jou, ongeacht of je een professional bent in de uitvaartindustrie, persoonlijk verlies hebt ervaren of simpelweg nieuwsgierig bent naar de menselijke ervaring rondom afscheid nemen. Deze podcast biedt diepgaande gesprekken en eert de geliefden die we zijn verloren.

Kom naar de dansvloer van "Dansen met de Dood", de podcast die de taboes doorbreekt en het leven omarmt, zelfs wanneer de schaduw van de dood dichterbij komt. Ben jij klaar voor deze intrigerende dans? Abonneer je nu en ontdek welke verborgen schatten deze podcast voor jou in petto heeft. Laat je betoveren en abonneer je vandaag nog!

description:

After 15 years in the corporate environment and one too many layoffs, this sassy & faith-filled ball of energy took her "show on the road" and created a life she once dreamed about!

Becoming an entrepreneur wasn't something she imagined for herself, but God had other plans... so her side hustle of speaking, coaching, and motivating those around her became her full-time gig and she's never looking back.

Tune in weekly to catch all the awesomeness she has to share on life (the ups & downs), business (from wanna-be CEO to legit MeEO), faith (crazy faith!), money (I'm all about it), LinkedIn, personal branding, and of course... owning your awesome!

Connect with Miranda on LinkedIn or Instagram where you can find lots of content, giveaways, tips & tricks to live the life you're truly called to!

https://MirandaVonFricken.com

description:
¡Bienvenido a nuestro podcast de renta vacacional! Sumérgete en el fascinante mundo de la industria de la renta vacacional mientras entrevistamos a destacados profesionales en el campo. Desde administradores de propiedades y propietarios hasta empresas especializadas en renta vacacional, exploraremos todos los aspectos de esta industria en constante evolución.

Además, no nos limitaremos solo a los profesionales directamente relacionados con la renta vacacional. También conversaremos con proveedores clave como corredores de bienes raíces, diseñadores, arquitectos, desarrolladores y muchos más, para obtener una visión completa de la industria.

Nuestro enfoque es educativo. A través de las experiencias y el conocimiento compartidos por nuestros invitados, aprenderás valiosas lecciones y consejos en cada episodio. Sin embargo, no nos conformamos con ser solo informativos: nuestras conversaciones serán amenas y en un tono de charla, evitando las entrevistas formales y frías.

Únete a nosotros en este viaje emocionante mientras descubrimos los secretos del éxito en la industria de la renta vacacional y nos sumergimos en historias fascinantes y perspectivas únicas de los profesionales que la conforman. ¡Prepárate para ser inspirado y motivado en cada episodio de nuestro podcast!

title: The POD Gods
description:
Are you ready to dive into a world where love, conspiracy theories and business intersect? Welcome to "The Pod Gods," a captivating podcast that delves deep into the diverse topics that pique our curiosity and ignite our passions. Join us as we unravel the mysteries, explore the trends, and unravel the hidden gems in these fascinating realms.

Hosted by a team of charismatic and knowledgeable personalities, "The Pod Gods" is the ultimate audio sanctuary for those seeking thought-provoking conversations and engaging storytelling. We believe that everyone has a story to tell and that each topic is interconnected, influencing our lives in unexpected ways.

In each episode, we invite you to join us on an immersive journey through the tapestry of human experiences. Whether we're discussing the intricacies of love and relationships or unraveling captivating conspiracy theories, we leave no stone unturned. Our goal is to entertain, enlighten, and spark conversations that challenge the status quo.

Curiosity knows no boundaries, and "The Pod Gods" embrace this philosophy wholeheartedly. In our pop culture segments, we dissect the latest trends, movies, music, and art that shape our society. We take you beyond the surface level, exploring the underlying meanings and impacts of these cultural phenomena.

But our podcast doesn't stop there. We believe that knowledge is power, and understanding the world of real estate, mortgages, and business is vital in today's ever-changing landscape. We invite experts in these fields to share their insights, tips, and strategies to help you navigate the complexities of these industries confidently.

"The Pod Gods" is not just a podcast; it's a community of open-minded individuals who are passionate about learning and sharing ideas. We encourage our listeners to participate actively, engaging in discussions, debates, and sharing their own stories and experiences.

So, whether you're a lover of captivating tales, an aficionado of conspiracy theories, a pop culture enthusiast, a real estate mogul, or a budding entrepreneur, "The Pod Gods" is your gateway to a world of knowledge, entertainment, and inspiration.

Tune in to "The Pod Gods" and let your imagination soar as we unlock the secrets, unravel the myths, and explore the vast tapestry of love, conspiracy theories, pop culture, real estate, mortgages, and business. Together, we'll challenge conventional wisdom and embark on a transformative journey of discovery.

Remember, the gods are listening. Are you ready to join the conversation?

title: A Cast of Entrepreneurs
description:
Hello and welcome to A Cast of Entrepreneurs, brought to you by the Entrepreneurs’ Forum.

 

I’m Elaine Stroud, Chief Executive of the Entrepreneurs’ Forum, and together with Sally Cowling, our Head of Marketing, we’ve been talking to entrepreneurs from all over the North East about what it’s really like to be an entrepreneur. We’re getting the real insight into their lives and businesses. 

 

This series brings together a cast of 36 North East entrepreneurs. So fasten your seatbelt as we’re going on a roller coaster ride from basketball to crafting, from excavation to Atlantic rowing, from selling darts in the playground to 70th birthday celebrations. 

 

Join us as we talk to our resident entrepreneur of the year, Mike O’Brien from Opencast; Sara Davies MBE, crafting queen and TV dragon; Tim Wilks, owner of Lane 7, one of the Sunday Times fastest growing UK companies; and the youthful passion of startup entrepreneur Rosie Bath and her sustainable business Cera Cotton. 

 

These are conversations to inspire you and to energise you. Enjoy listening!

Get involved with The Entrepreneurs’ Forum: https://entrepreneursforum.net/

如果您对马来西亚企业家们的故事和投资价值感兴趣，那么这个播客绝对是您的首选。加入我们，一起探索马来西亚创业者们的精彩旅程和令人钦佩的成就！立即收听《老板面对面 - LXInvest》播客，了解更多马来西亚企业家的成功故事和投资机会。

title: What Leaders Want
description:
Join Jay Delling, the host of "What Leaders Want", as he interviews leaders who share their leadership journey and best practices.

About Jay Delling:

Jay is a sales, marketing and organizational process development expert. A 20-plus year veteran of the healthcare industry, he managed pharmaceutical products, sales teams, and clinical liaisons in multiple states for both Novartis and Pfizer. Coupled with his experience in home health and telehealth service options, Jay provides Conatus3 customers with a broad range of expertise in profit acceleration. A co-author of $50K in 50 Minutes, Jay helps clients identify the strategic areas of their business to increase profits quickly.

His sales process development programs are nationally recognized and resulted in multiple President’s Awards for Sales Excellence. Jay’s therapeutic knowledge and sales expertise led him to on-boarding, developing and coaching new sales representatives where he rekindled his passion for developing others to their full potential.

The former collegiate Golf coach and Sports Information Director at Newman University has also served as Communications Director for the Wichita Open for 30+ years. Jay is passionate about helping young people develop their potential.

As Vice President of Implementation, Jay serves Conatus3 clients as both an executive coach and continuous improvement planning expert. Jay's expertise in developing strengths-based CIPs and teaching others how to implement these plans across their organizations make him an exceptional resource.

Jay’s focus with Conatus3 allows him to help people generate a passion to perform at their personal best every day, whether they are in the boardroom or on the golf course.

Learn more about Conatus3 LLC: https://conatus3.com/

title: The Dave & Marcia Show
description:
About The Dave and Marcia Show

- Our listeners are financial advisors from all channels and all ages. Many think they provide adequate retirement income advice for clients nearing and living in retirement. Many think they are building relationships with women. Most will find out too late they are not.

- We want the listeners to get new, different, and interesting information from the show that they can use to understand the reality out there. They’ll build from:

o Real women. Real stories. Each woman’s journey is fascinating and filled with unique steps and stumbles and successes. As a society, we don’t celebrate her journey. They are looking for much more than a spreadsheet, a quarterly report on earnings, and a pie chart. But most advisors are not delivering.

o And income. Dave and Marcia are veterans of the retirement savings and retirement income industry. They know women have been left out of the conversation. They know financial advisors are struggling to understand women clients and win their assets for the long-term. And, they know how women get left out of the money decisions, due to a combination of laws that put her in the backseat and financial advisors who don’t include her in the process or conversation.

- In this podcast, we’ll help advisors change course before it’s too late. To help women successfully manage through retirement and have the income they need and want, changes are necessary. Advisors will hear from:

o Boomer women about their life’s journey and where they are going next.

o From Gen X women who feel left out of the conversations despite their success.

o And, from Millennial women who are completely reinventing life as we know it.

It’s no secret women will control the majority of wealth in the next 10 years. It’s estimated that more than two-thirds of wealth will be held by women in the US by 2030. That’s some $30 Trillion that will change hands over the next several years.

Our mission is to educate financial advisors, wealth managers, and insurance advisors in every channel on how to best serve this powerful market. First from a boomer women’s perspective. Then how to further adapt to handle new challenges and a different definition of “retirement” for younger women.

Franquicias disponibles.

Es tu oportunidad de tener tu propio negocio, en el que recibirás las mejores satisfacciones.

Alambrados Navarro es una manera fresca y diferente de hacer negocios.

Franquicia de bajo costo y fácil operación con un rápido retorno de la inversión.

Es una franquicia comercial, exitosa y barata.

Empresa dedicada a colaborar con la seguridad de la familia y el patrimonio.

Es una franquicia comercial exitosa y barata que se desarrolla dentro del área de la construcción.

Ofreciendo siempre una garantía de calidad de los bienes comercializados.

Alambrados Navarro cumple 44 años de servicio ininterrumpido, por lo que puede ofrecer a sus franquiciados acceso a nuestra experiencia en éste negocio.

title: The Power of the Momentum Mindset
description: The Momentum Mindset: Embracing Moments in Life and Business is a captivating podcast hosted by us, Jason Kidwell and Luke Miller, experienced real estate professionals and upward moving entrepreneurs. We're excited to share our insights, experiences, and wisdom with you as we navigate the highs and lows of the business world while balancing our families, personal growth, and finding joy in every season of life. Join us as we delve into a wide range of captivating topics, exploring the fascinating intersection of psychology, business, brands and marketing, real estate, sales, economics, entrepreneurship, and the power of having a growth mindset. Through engaging discussions, personal anecdotes, and interviews with industry experts, we'll shed light on the challenges and triumphs we've faced in the real estate profession. We're here to reveal practical strategies that have helped us maintain balance, resilience, and momentum even during the toughest times. Whether you're an aspiring entrepreneur, curious about real estate investment or sales, a seasoned professional, or simply seeking inspiration, our podcast offers valuable insights and actionable advice to help you cultivate a momentum mindset in your own life and business. We want to help you thrive in the ever-evolving world of real estate, unleash your full potential, and create a fulfilling and prosperous life. So, if you're ready to gain a fresh perspective, expand your knowledge, and embrace the transformative power of momentum, join us on The Momentum Mindset: Embracing Moments in Life and Business. Together, let's embark on this exciting journey of growth and discovery!

title: I Quit! How to Leave the "Real World" for the "REAL" World
description:
I quit! I quit? I want to quit? I'll never quit. I can't quit.

Why is it so hard to quit a job you don't love and start the business you've always wanted to start? Why do we think about it so much but never make the leap? Why is the comfort of our reasonable success so hard to trade for the possibility of way more success?

I Quit! is about leaving the life you don't love (the "real world") in favor of something so much better and brighter (the "REAL" world).

In I Quit, I share how I left my $2 million dollar construction company behind in search of something much less certain but with the potential to be so much more fulfilling.

I Quit is for those of us who have seen reasonable success in our lives, but know that there's still more out there for us.

Join me as I take you through all the ups and downs of leaving behind the life you have to look for the promise of the life you've always wanted.

You know it's out there for you, You know you have it in you. So tune in and let's figure out how you can say I Quit!

While the conversation may go anywhere, it typically revolves around product strategy & decision-making, user research, UX, definitions of product success, and how all of these fit into the bigger picture in a business.

How do you create a successful product? How do you measure it? Why is user experience important to a business? How should you decide what to build, when, and for whom?

Listen in to Re:Design/Growth to hear tech industry veterans' answers to all these questions and more!

-----

Re:Design/Growth is hosted by the co-founders of Trymata, a leader in the user insights and UX research space.

title: Business Flow 8 podcast
description:
A Business Flow 8 Podcast a legdinamikusabban fejlődő hazai üzleti közösség, podcast műsorai a FÓRUM és a KO-OK mind a vállalkozásfejlesztésre és karrier építésre alapoznak Gundel Takács Gábor műsorvezetésével.

Mit kell tudnod a Business Flow 8 Podcastról?

Dinamikus, vállalkozói közösségünk olyan üzletembereket, cégtulajdonosokat, marketingeseket tömörít, akik folyamatos fejlődésre és üzleti inspirációra vágynak. A honlapunkon elérhető szakmai anyagok, networking eseményeink és online meetupjaink, segítik a hazai vállalkozókat a fejlődésben.

A két műsor formátumunk:

A Business Flow 8 podctast heti rendszerességgel jelentkezik. Két formátumban találkozhatsz velünk. A FÓRUM Podcast havi 3 alkalommal jelentkező podcast adás, a műsorvezető Gundel Takács Gábor. Minden adásban, a meghívott vendégekkel előre egyeztetett témát dolgozunk fel. A műsorvezető adásonként 3 meghívott vendéggel fogja ütköztetni a véleményeket. A KO-OK ezzel szemben nem a különböző vélemények ütköztetésére szolgál. Ez az adás sokkal inkább mélyinterjú jellegű, ahol Gábor havonta 1 alkalommal a meghívott vendég legnagyobb személyes és szakmai kudarcairól, fájdalmairól és az újrakezdés nehézségeiről, annak eredményeiről faggatja a mikrofon másik végén ülő vendéget.

Talán már hallottál rólunk, hiszen eddig is olyan inspiráló eseményekkel tettük le a névjegyünket, mint a 2 havonta megrendezésre kerülő Floow Day -ahol minimum 250 vállalkozó gyűlik össze minden alkalommal-, valamint a heti rendszerességgel jelentkező Flow 8 online meetup sorozat, ahol a vállalkozói élet minden területéről dolgozzuk fel az üzletembereket foglalkoztató legfontosabb kérdéseket.

title: Hadi Birlikte Gidelim
description:
HADİ BİRLİKTE GİDELİM

Merhabalar

Ben Özge McAree

Her hangi bir yerden başlayabilmek, harekete geçebilmek isteyen, ilham almaya , yeni bir şeyler öğrenmeye ve kendini geliştirmeye hevesli herkesin ilgisini çekeceğini düşündüğüm.

“hadi birlikte gidelim” adlı podcast serime hoşgeldiniz.

İnsan için bir şeyler yapma, insanı değerli kılma” oldu benim amacım gerek profesyonel gerek kişisel hayatımda ve buna hala devam ediyorum.

Beraber öğrenelim

Eğlenelim

Farklı düşünelim

Yürünmeyen yollar varsa beraber yürüyelim

Var mısınız ?

Hadi birlikte gidelim

Ben kimim?

Yönetici, Kurumsal Eğitmen, Sporcu ve yoluna çıkan her şeye karşı merak duygusu olan bir yazar. Ben buyum. İnsan potansiyeline hayranım ve hem kişisel hem de profesyonel olarak nasıl kendimizin en iyi versiyonu olabileceğimizi öğrenmeye devam ediyorum. Bir de birbiriyle bağlantısı olmayan çeşitli şeylere tutkum var: iş, satış, yazı yazmak, fitness, dans (dans kardiyo), yemek (sağlıklı beslenme), moda (stil), güzellik (cilt bakımı ve makyaj), koku, psikoloji ve girişimcilik bunlardan sadece birkaçı.

title: Passion Vista Podcast
description:
Welcome to the Passion Vista Podcast, a platform that goes beyond conventional boundaries to provide inspiration, education, and motivation. Our mission is to create an enriching experience for our audience by featuring accomplished individuals who share their success stories, insights, and expertise.

Through engaging conversations, we delve into the personal and professional journeys of our guests, exploring the challenges they faced, the strategies they employed, and the lessons they learned along the way. These remarkable stories of perseverance and triumph ignite ambition and fuel motivation, encouraging listeners to pursue their dreams and overcome obstacles with resilience.

While success stories are at the core of our podcast, we also believe in the power of knowledge and diverse perspectives. Our guests not only share their personal experiences but also delve into topics that are inspiring, educational, and motivating. From industry trends and innovative ideas to personal development strategies and thought-provoking discussions, we provide a platform that expands horizons and encourages continuous learning.

Furthermore, the Passion Vista Podcast aims to foster a community of growth-oriented individuals and industry leaders. We facilitate networking opportunities and connections that enable professional growth and collaborations. Our guests are encouraged to promote their products, services, and innovations, generating awareness and opening doors to potential business opportunities.

As a reputable source of thought leadership, we contribute to industry conversations and provide valuable insights on emerging trends, practices, and challenges. Our commitment to being a reliable resource extends to sharing practical advice, industry best practices, and actionable strategies that our audience can implement in their own careers and businesses.

Join us on the Passion Vista Podcast as we Motivate, Inspire, and Empower our audience with success stories, diverse discussions, and valuable insights. Together, let's create a community of ambitious individuals who embrace personal and professional growth, and who strive for excellence in all aspects of life.

title: Modern Girl
description:

title: Keeping It Real: The Purpose Driven Life With Laura & Lynn
description:
Keeping It Real: The Purpose Driven Life With Laura & Lynn" is an enlightening podcast that dives deep into the power of authenticity in both business and personal life. Join hosts Laura and Lynn as they share inspiring stories, practical strategies, and thought-provoking conversations centered around embracing authenticity.

In each episode, Laura and Lynn explore the profound impact of being true to oneself in the realms of business and personal relationships. They discuss how authenticity serves as a foundation for success, empowering listeners to build genuine connections, establish trust, and foster meaningful collaborations in the business world. They dive into the importance of aligning personal values and passions with professional pursuits to create a fulfilling and purpose-driven career.

Beyond the business sphere, Laura and Lynn provide insights into how authenticity shapes personal growth, happiness, and overall well-being. They discuss the liberating effects of embracing vulnerability, shedding societal expectations, and living authentically in all aspects of life. Listeners will gain valuable advice on cultivating self-acceptance, nurturing authentic relationships, and finding balance amidst the demands of modern living.

"Keeping It Real: The Purpose Driven Life With Laura & Lynn" is a must-listen podcast for individuals who seek to lead more authentic, purposeful lives. Laura and Lynn's genuine and relatable approach creates a welcoming space where listeners can gain practical tools and inspiration to navigate the complexities of balancing authenticity in both their personal and professional journeys. Tune in and embark on a transformative exploration of authenticity, discovering the power it holds to unlock your true potential in all areas of life.

Get expert advice on the property market, stay updated on sports highlights, and dive into thought-provoking analysis of the latest news stories. Whether you're a real estate enthusiast, a sports fan, or a curious mind, this podcast has it all. Tune in and join the Neighborhood Sellers community today!

title: Content With A Purpose
description:
Content with a Purpose, The Podcast, is a seminar-style business and marketing show packed with actionable step-by-step tips and inspiring stories that are helping thousands figure out the next chapter of their life and chase bolder dreams.

Host Gabby Rendon brings you SEO strategies, productivity tips, business hacks, authentic entrepreneurship truths, and inspirational stories from other mom entrepreneurs that can help you figure out the next chapter of your life, whether it is starting your dream business or finding purpose in your current lifestyle.

Gabby shares tangible, actionable advice that she used to answer the “now what” moment and become a mom entrepreneur through digital marketing, volunteering, and motherhood. She’s sharing everything that has helped her navigate over a decade of entrepreneurship.

Along with sharing her best-kept secrets, she interviews successful mom entrepreneurs in the world who will share their secrets to ensure you are seen, heard, and getting sales!!!

The Content with a Purpose Podcast is growing every day, and now it’s your turn to hear from the experts, get inspired, and find the purpose that ignites the next chapter of your life.

title: the e-word
description:
Leadership lessons from some top executives who have mastered the power of empathy to drive growth and change.

Our “e-word” here is Empathy. Leading with empathy has received more and growing attention in recent years. Much has been written on the topic, across industries and cultures. This topic also often intersects dynamics of geo-political and diversity/inclusion. In our series, we meet with accomplished executives to illustrate and learn how utilizing empathetic leadership in various ways can drive success. Each guest executive will highlight specific themes and functional disciplines, such as marketing or customer experience, and collectively the series will provide a broad foundation of insights and tips to help our audience hone their own leadership approaches.

I think I'll be good right? Just in case I'll use this as proof.

title: The True Purpose Podcast
description:

In each episode of The True Purpose Podcast, we'll explore stories and insights from remarkable guests, including renowned entrepreneurs and leaders who exemplify what it means to build a business with true purpose.

title: ERIC 之聲 - 你想聽的亞馬遜主場優勢
description:
歡迎來到"ERIC 之聲：你想聽的亞馬遜主場優勢" Podcast頻道，我是你的主持人，Eric。

過去，我是一個朝九晚五的上班族，為了五斗米折腰，忙碌地追求老闆的目標和夢想，直到我讀了一本書——窮爸爸富爸爸。那本書，以及巴菲特大神的金句，"如果你沒辦法在你睡覺的時候也有收入，那你會一直工作直到你死去"，讓我深感打擊。

我意識到，我不應該只換取時薪，我需要改變。我需要擺脫窮人思維，離開只用時間換取金錢的路徑。我知道我需要做出變化，否則我將永遠只是一個左邊象限的人。每個人一天只有24小時，8小時工作，8小時睡覺，差距就在剩下的8小時。

於是，我選擇了亞馬遜。我想在這個平台上找到自己的主場優勢，創造我自己的財富。我開始了我的亞馬遜賣家生涯，雖然道路坎坷，但我從未放棄。在這個頻道裡，我會與你分享我在亞馬遜的旅程，分享我的挫折、成功和我是如何在這個充滿挑戰的電商世界找到自己的主場優勢。

在我追求成為亞馬遜成功賣家的路途中，我從未放棄，這與我對籃球的熱愛是相同的。從國中開始，我就熱愛籃球，特別是對湖人隊永遠的老大黑曼巴 Kobe Bryant的崇敬。他的字典裡面永遠沒有失敗這個字，他認為，除非你停止嘗試，否則都不算失敗。

我深深受到他角逐全美最強高中籃球員過程中展現的渴望勝利和堅定決心的感動。他會反覆觀看錄影帶，觀察比他前面一名的高中生球員的優點和弱點，找出方法贏過他們。

這種精神實際上與我們在亞馬遜店鋪銷售的心態是如出一轍的。 在亞馬遜的世界裡，我們必須一直往前追趕競爭對手，直到成為Best Seller。任何類目都有 Best Seller，但他們不會永遠都在那裡，榮耀是短暫的，只有不斷進步才能保持領先。如果有人可以追上他，為什麼不會是我？ 這樣的堅韌與毅力，是我在亞馬遜之旅中所追求的。

我要讓你知道，這裡是一個你可以放心服用的地方，我不會割韭菜。我自己也曾是一個受害者，對於那些利用知識差異割韭菜的人，我感到深深的厭惡。我不願意像那些在淘金熱潮中賣鏟子的人，也不喜歡利用信息不對稱性，賣給你昂貴但不一定有用的產品或服務。我痛恨像Kevin David這樣的人，他是被FTC認證的詐欺犯，利用銷售漏斗行銷技巧來銷售他的課程和不切實際的美夢。相反的，我的目標是，如果能多救一個人就救一個，讓他們免於像我當初那樣成為受害者。

並且我期望在這個Podcast頻道裡，透過分享我的經驗和策略，能幫助到你們，讓你們也能一直向前，直到成為Best Seller，實現自己的夢想。接著讓我們一起加入"ERIC 之聲：你想聽的亞馬遜主場優勢" Podcast頻道，揭示電商世界的真實面貌，並一起走向成功吧。

感謝您收聽ERIC之聲，聽了那是有甲意，快去揪你朋友來聽！

title: Un Café au Club

Au cœur de Paris, dans les confortables locaux du Club, nous accueillons des figures politiques notoires, des chefs d’entreprise au grand succès, et les figures principales du monde juridique.

Notre approche unique démontre que le droit est indispensable pour comprendre le monde autour de nous, avec une combinaison de rigueur analytique et curiosité insatiable, tout en interrogeant nos invités sur les thèmes qui façonnent le monde Francophone aujourd’hui.

Entonces, si esa información está al alcance de la mano ¿por qué no todos gozamos de los mismos frutos?

Este libro es más que una lista a completar, una historia de vida. Por eso es necesario presentar algo de contexto ya que esto nos ayudará a entender que además de una historia de éxito, es la historia de un ser humano que, en contra de situaciones que podrían verse como desfavorables, logró cambiar su destino.

title: The Heart of Rural America
description:
Welcome to the Heart of Rural America podcast. I’m your host, Amanda Radke ​-- a South Dakota cattle rancher, wife, mom of four, children’s book author, and motivational speaker.

I started this show with a simple goal in mind -- to share the untold stories of the often-overlooked independent farmer and rancher. On this program, We’ll discuss the challenges that face rural America and the anti-animal agriculture agenda that seeks to eliminate our way of life. But in the face of these ongoing battles, we’ll explore impactful solutions and meaningful pathways to profitability in order to keep producers on the land, to safeguard our private property rights, and to keep meat, dairy, and eggs on the dinner table.

And in stark contrast to the ugly, divisive headlines in today’s mainstream media, "The Heart of Rural America" will celebrate the faith, family values, patriotism, and work ethic of the incredible people I meet in my travels as an agricultural speaker. I hope you’ll be inspired by these agricultural entrepreneurs and rural families, just as I am.

Now let’s hit the dusty trail together as we uncover The Heart of Rural America. - Amanda

This podcast is brought to you by SNS ICE – an EU-backed project focused on creating a collaborative environment for the development and deployment of 6G smart networks and services. The project has received funding from the European Union’s Horizon Europe Research and Innovation programme under Grant Agreement No 101095841.

title: Think Big with Dan & Qasim
description:
Welcome to "Think Big with Dan & Qasim," the podcast where we embark on a journey of empowerment, inspiration, and growth with brand owners from around the world. Join hosts Dan and Qasim as they delve into the stories of visionary entrepreneurs, seeking to uplift their businesses and share their valuable experiences with the world.

In each episode, we sit down with passionate and innovative minds, from established brands to budding startups, to uncover the secrets behind their success. Through insightful interviews and candid conversations, we dive deep into the challenges they faced, the strategies they implemented, and the lessons they learned on their entrepreneurial journeys.

Our mission is simple - to provide a platform for brands of all sizes and niches to shine. By showcasing these diverse voices, we hope to inspire listeners and offer actionable insights that can be applied to their own ventures. Whether you're an aspiring entrepreneur, a business owner looking to scale up, or simply curious about the world of brands and marketing, our podcast has something to offer for everyone.

Dan and Qasim, your dynamic hosts, bring a wealth of experience and passion to the table. With backgrounds in business development, marketing, and entrepreneurship, they know what it takes to make an impact in the ever-evolving world of commerce. Their genuine curiosity and enthusiasm fuel engaging conversations that leave no stone unturned.

From tales of perseverance and resilience to tales of breakthroughs and triumphs, "Think Big with Dan & Qasim" is a melting pot of inspiration and motivation. We believe that every brand, big or small, has a story worth telling, and we're here to bring those stories to life.

But it's not just about the success stories. We also explore the challenges and setbacks that entrepreneurs encounter along the way. By sharing these authentic experiences, we hope to foster a supportive community where learning from failures is just as important as celebrating achievements.

In addition to brand owners, we also feature industry experts and thought leaders who offer valuable advice and strategies to help our audience navigate the dynamic business landscape. From marketing tactics and branding insights to tips for maintaining work-life balance, our episodes cover a diverse range of topics to empower our listeners.

So, whether you're tuning in during your morning commute, during a workout, or while winding down at the end of the day, "Think Big with Dan & Qasim" promises to be a valuable addition to your podcast playlist. Our goal is to leave you feeling inspired, motivated, and armed with the knowledge to make a positive impact on your business and personal growth.

Are you ready to think big and elevate your perspective? Join us as we connect with extraordinary individuals and take a deep dive into the world of brands and entrepreneurship. Don't miss out on the opportunity to be part of this enriching experience.

Subscribe to "Think Big with Dan & Qasim" on your favorite podcast platform, and get ready to be inspired! Remember, no dream is too big when you think big.

title: Chase Those Dreams
description: "Chase Your Dreams." It's a name that holds immense significance for me, especially in 2023. This year has been all about pursuing my dreams, and I can't wait to share my journey with you in future videos. But that's not all! This channel is about real talk, authenticity, and taking you behind the scenes of some exciting projects. Plus, we'll have amazing guests joining us from time to time. They'll be sharing their own stories of dream-chasing and how they turned their aspirations into reality.

title: Beauty Babble
description:
Welcome to Beauty Babble, the ultimate podcast for aspiring and seasoned professionals in the beauty industry. Hosted by industry experts, we dive deep into what it truly takes to thrive in this dynamic field. Whether you're a makeup artist, hairstylist, esthetician, or beauty enthusiast, we've got you covered. Get ready to elevate your skills, knowledge, and career in the world of beauty!

Join us as we explore a wide range of topics that will expand your knowledge and skills. Discover valuable resources for continued education, the latest trends, innovative techniques and must-have products. We share insider secrets, discuss the nuances of different spa treatments, and uncover the hidden gems. And let's not forget the best part—exclusive interviews with the leaders and trailblazers of the beauty biz. Hear firsthand from industry icons, influencers, and entrepreneurs as they share their experiences, tips, and strategies for success. Their wisdom and insights will inspire and motivate you on your own beauty journey.

Have burning questions about the beauty industry? We've got answers. Our Q&A sessions provide insightful solutions to your most pressing queries, helping you navigate the complexities of this ever-evolving landscape.

Hosted by Suzanne Dias, Director of Education and Training at Beauty Cult, and Darine Moukhaiber-Krysko, Communications and Marketing Strategist.

Beauty Babble podcast is brought by Beauty Cult Canada, https://beautycult.ca/.

title: Podcast At The Table
description: Introducing Podcast at the Table! In our inaugural episode, we talk briefly about ourselves as entrepreneurs, business owners, husbands, fathers, and men and how we wish to give back by sharing our own personal life experiences of both success and failure through real-life stories. We discuss motivation vs. discipline, and why there's a HUGE but powerful difference between the two. We also touch on commitment, intent and self-preservation. Success and self-improvement always starts within one's self and in life there are no failures, only lessons that are learned. Join us on our journey towards success in any aspect of life through our trials, tribulations and everyday experiences. Welcome to The Table!

Tune in to hear from our distinguished guests as they share their personal stories of resilience and tenacity. Our aim is to inspire, educate, and empower entrepreneurs and leaders, providing them with useful insights on how to chase their dreams and goals even in the face of hardship, while adhering to their core values and leading a life imbued with purpose and significance.

title: Soulful Success Strategies Masterclass
description:
Soulful Success Strategies: Thriving with Authenticity in the Modern World

Introduction: Welcome to the "Soulful Success Strategies" virtual workshop, where we'll embark on a transformative journey to achieve your goals without sacrificing your values. Led by the brilliant life purpose coach, Washanta, this workshop will empower you to conquer the challenges of the modern world while staying true to your authentic self. Get ready to unlock the secrets to soulful success and embrace a life filled with purpose, passion, and fulfillment.

Masterclass Overview:

Session 1: Aligning Your Values with Your Goals

  • Discover the power of aligning your core values with your aspirations.

  • Learn how staying true to your values can lead to a more meaningful journey.

Session 2: Cultivating a Soulful Mindset

  • Overcome self-doubt and embrace failure as a stepping stone.

  • Develop an unshakable faith in your abilities.

Session 3: Setting Purposeful Goals

  • Define your vision with clarity and craft a roadmap to your dreams.

  • Break down long-term goals into actionable steps.

Session 4: Navigating Challenges with Grace

  • Explore effective strategies to handle challenges while preserving authenticity.

  • Tap into your inner strength and remain true to yourself in adversity.

Session 5: Embracing Mindful Success Practices

  • Uncover the power of mindfulness in achieving soulful success.

  • Balance ambition with inner peace and cultivate a harmonious work-life integration.

Session 6: Empowering Your Authentic Leadership

  • Discover the art of authentic leadership that inspires and motivates others.

  • Harness your unique strengths, communication skills, and empathy to lead with integrity and compassion.

Congratulations on completing the "Soulful Success Strategies" virtual workshop! Armed with valuable insights and powerful tools, you are now equipped to conquer your goals without compromising your values. As you step into the world with newfound confidence and purpose, may you continue to thrive and make a positive impact on those around you. Embrace your journey with an open heart, stay committed to your values, and watch as soulful success unfolds in every aspect of your life. Together, let's create a future where success is a reflection of your true self – a beacon of inspiration for others to follow. Get ready to conquer the world, soulfully and unapologetically! Let's embark on this transformative journey together and make your dreams a reality.

title: AVIATOR
description: "Авиатор" является захватывающей азартной игрой, приобретшей популярность среди тех, кто предпочитает дозу адреналина и волнение от азартных игр. Официальный портал AVIATOR https://aviator-now.com/ предоставляет игрокам шанс испытать удачу, сыграв в игры на реальные деньги.Механика "Авиатора" основана на принципе возрастающего коэффициента, который увеличивается вместе с продолжительностью полета самолета. Участники делают ставки и решают, когда лучше забрать выигрыш до того, как самолет "упадет", а ставки обнулятся. Игра привлекает как новичков, так и опытных игроков благодаря ее интуитивному интерфейсу и простым правилам.Платформа AVIATOR предлагает множество платежных систем для удобного ввода и вывода денежных средств, обеспечивая безопасность операций. Кроме того, игроки могут использовать бонусы и промокоды, чтобы увеличить свои возможности для успеха.

title: Operation GOTH
description:
Operation GOTH aka Operation Get Out The Hood, is a podcast hosted by Michael Smith-Grant (commonly known as Ekard) with his partner-in-crime and co-host Kayla. This podcast will cover a range of topics mainly from stories of obtaining financial freedom, to the highs and lows. Ekard is a full-time content creator while Kayla is a full-time working-class consumer.

Operation GOTH is a motto Ekard came up with that works in multiple phases. Phase 1: Getting Out The Hood (achieve a state of financial security), Phase 2: Stay Out The Hood (Improving ones financial security to financial stability) and Phase 3: Help Other Get Out The Hood (The ultimate step after obtaining wealth in both knowledge and financials).

As a content creator, Ekard will offer insight about how he has tried to grow on platforms, the best and worst sponsorships he's had, and especially the worst experiences working with brands. Ekard will also share insight on what he's learned in trying to build his following over the past 13 years as a content creator.

As a consumer who has dabbled in content creation but now works full-time, Kayla will offer her stance on someone who consumes content and her stance on the realities of 'Get Rich or Die Tryin' as a person trying to escape the rat race of life and the dreaded 9-5.

Welcome to an adventure like no other as this operation gets underway!

Whether you're a seasoned entrepreneur or a budding business enthusiast, this podcast is tailor-made for you. title: Life, Entrepreneurship and Tech
description: Ashish Tulsian is Co-founder and CEO of Posist Technologies. He founded Posist in 2012 with Sakshi Bhasin Tulsian. Being the product visionary at Posist, He scaled the company from a two-member team to 100+ employees, serving over 15,000+ leading restaurants in 50+ countries. He is a rare combination of a Technocrat and Restaurateur, kick-starting his entrepreneurial journey back in 2007, by founding a telecom company serving major telecom operators in India for value-added services. A side investment in a restaurant out of passion ultimately drove me to build a tech solution to automate the business, resulting in the founding of Posist Technologies in 2012. He has over 15 years of experience in scaling and leading the Product, Marketing, Sales, Support, and Customer success functions. He has earned his degree in Engineering from Bharati Vidyapeeth College of Engineering, New Delhi.
