title: THRIVE | The Family Business Podcast
description:
Welcome to THRIVE, a transformative business podcast presented by John Good Group. In this captivating series, we embark on a journey to explore the world of family-owned businesses and uncover the keys to their continued success.

Through insightful conversations with passionate entrepreneurs from across the country, we delve deep into the dynamics of passing the torch, the art of adaptation, and the pitfalls faced by family enterprises.

At THRIVE, we believe that family-owned businesses possess a unique spirit that sets them apart. This podcast aims to celebrate and nurture that spirit by providing a platform for open, honest, and enlightening discussions. We go beyond the surface level to reveal the unfiltered stories and invaluable lessons that are often hidden within family circles.

Our mission is to equip both current and future generations with the knowledge and inspiration needed to navigate the complexities of sustaining and growing a family enterprise.

Just as a thriving plant needs nurturing, so do family-owned businesses. In each episode, we dig deep into the rich soil of experience and expertise, exploring the trials and tribulations that come with running a business across generations. By sharing candid narratives and personal anecdotes, our guests bring a level of rawness and vulnerability to the podcast that is rarely found in traditional interviews.

The result is a thought-provoking and emotionally charged dialogue that will resonate with entrepreneurs and business enthusiasts alike.

Join us on this exhilarating expedition as we explore the intricacies of family-owned businesses. Each episode will unveil the secrets to thriving amidst change, unlocking the potential of the new generation, and cultivating a lasting legacy. Together, let us embark on this transformative voyage, discovering the power within family enterprises to not just survive, but to truly THRIVE.

title: FACE-Spicy Room Talk
description:
🎙️ Welcome to FACE-Spicy Room Talk: The Podcast for Visionary Founders 🌟

Are you a founder seeking the insights, strategies, and inspiration to take your startup to the next level? Look no further! Introducing "FACE-Spicy Room Talk," the podcast where we dive deep into the world of entrepreneurship, innovation, and business growth. I'm your host, Poe Aye, the founder of FACE - Founder and Creative Entrepreneurs, and I'm excited to embark on this journey with you.

🔥 What's the Spice About?

"FACE-Spicy Room Talk" is your go-to podcast for candid conversations with a twist. We're not afraid to bring the heat! Each episode, we'll be joined by extraordinary guests who are industry leaders, successful entrepreneurs, investors, and experts. We'll be serving up spicy discussions that cut through the noise and get straight to the heart of what it takes to thrive in the startup world.

🎯 What to Expect:

🎙️ In-Depth Interviews: Get up close and personal with trailblazers who have navigated the startup landscape. Our guests will share their triumphs, challenges, and lessons learned on their entrepreneurial journeys.

🚀 Actionable Insights: Expect actionable advice, tangible strategies, and game-changing tips that you can implement right away to propel your startup forward.

💡 Innovation and Ideas: Explore the latest trends, emerging technologies, and innovative approaches that are reshaping industries.

🤝 Connections and Networking: Dive into discussions on building meaningful connections, forming partnerships, and attracting investors.

🎉 Success Stories: Tune in to inspirational success stories that will motivate you to push your limits and achieve your own entrepreneurial dreams.

🌐 Join the Conversation:

We believe in the power of community, and we want you to be a part of the conversation! Subscribe to "FACE-Spicy Room Talk" on your favorite podcast platform, and join us as we explore the dynamic world of startups. Together, we'll uncover the secrets to scaling businesses, overcoming obstacles, and creating impact in today's ever-evolving entrepreneurial landscape.

Remember to follow us on [Instagram, Twitter, etc.] for updates, episode highlights, and exclusive behind-the-scenes content.

Get ready for a podcast that's unfiltered, thought-provoking, and always spicing things up. Join us on "FACE-Spicy Room Talk" and let's dive deep into the heart of startup success!

To become a member of FACE visit the link below.

https://facebkk.co/

title: The Power Of Creative Entrepreneurship
description:
Creative entrepreneurship is a force that drives innovation, transforms industries, and shapes the world we live in. It is the fusion of creativity and business acumen, where individuals harness their imaginative ideas and turn them into successful ventures.

At its core, creative entrepreneurship is about pushing boundaries, challenging norms, and bringing fresh perspectives. It is about thinking outside the box and finding unique solutions to problems. Creative entrepreneurs are unafraid to take risks and embrace failure as a stepping stone to success.

One of the most potent aspects of creative entrepreneurship is its ability to disrupt established industries. It could revolutionize how we live, work, and interact with the world. Creative entrepreneurs are at the forefront of driving change and shaping the future, from breakthrough technologies to groundbreaking artistic endeavors.

Moreover, creative entrepreneurship is not limited to a specific field or industry. It encompasses various disciplines, including art, design, technology, and media. Whether you are a painter, a software developer, or a fashion designer, there is room for creative entrepreneurship in every domain.

The power of creative entrepreneurship lies in its ability to transform ideas into tangible realities. It empowers individuals to bring their visions to life and create something unique and innovative. It catalyzes personal and professional growth, requiring individuals to constantly learn, adapt, and evolve.

In today's rapidly changing world, where innovation is the key to staying relevant, creative entrepreneurship has become more critical than ever. It is a driving force behind economic growth and societal progress. By embracing the power of creative entrepreneurship, individuals can unleash their full potential and make a lasting impact on the world around them.

Want to know more? Visit @

Creative Digital Goods

"Innovative Digital Products for the Creator's Economy"

All About Annette

"The Creator Herself"

title: Palabras que laten
description:
Palabras que Laten

Sumérgete en el mundo de las conversaciones íntimas y reveladoras en "Palabras que Laten", el pódcast que te lleva a explorar las historias detrás de las personas. Presentado por Iván David Castaño, este espacio te invita a adentrarte en las mentes y corazones de individuos fascinantes, mientras comparten sus experiencias, sueños y desafíos en un ambiente de confianza.

Cada episodio es un viaje profundo hacia los pensamientos y emociones de nuestros invitados, quienes comparten sus relatos de vida, inspiraciones y reflexiones. Desde artistas hasta científicos, exploradores urbanos y soñadores, "Palabras que Laten" te ofrece una ventana a las vidas que laten en silencio detrás de la superficie.

Únete a nosotros mientras desentrañamos los secretos y las pasiones que conforman a estas personas extraordinarias. Prepárate para ser cautivado por las historias que tejen nuestra realidad y descubrirás que las palabras tienen el poder de latir con la fuerza de mil corazones.

Sintoniza "Palabras que Laten" y permite que las voces de nuestros invitados te guíen a través de un viaje de conexión humana más allá de lo convencional.

title: Overtime with Nav
description:
Welcome to "Overtime with Nav," the podcast that goes beyond the ordinary to explore the extraordinary journeys of entrepreneurs and visionaries who are committed to going the extra mile for success. Hosted by Navid Rahimian, a seasoned CPA and the driving force behind Nav Capital Consulting, this podcast is your ultimate guide to unlocking the secrets of achievement, personal growth, and innovation.

Key Topics of Conversation: 🚀 Business and Entrepreneurship: Join Nav as he dives deep into the dynamic world of business and entrepreneurship. Discover groundbreaking strategies, insights, and tales of triumph from guests who have turned their dreams into thriving ventures.

🧠 AI and Innovation: The future is now, and AI is at the forefront of transformation across industries. Explore how cutting-edge technologies are reshaping businesses, and gain insights into harnessing the power of AI for innovation and growth.

💡 Personal Growth and Success Mindset: Success isn't just about tactics; it's a state of mind. Learn from guests who have mastered the art of personal development and understand how cultivating a success-oriented mindset can drive you toward your goals.

🌐 Success Across Industries: Success stories are diverse, transcending industries and backgrounds. Tune in as Nav and his guests explore what it truly takes to thrive in fields as varied as finance, entertainment, technology, and more.

From riveting interviews to thought-provoking discussions, "Overtime with Nav" offers a front-row seat to the journeys of those who have redefined success. Whether you're an entrepreneur looking to gain a competitive edge or an aspiring innovator seeking inspiration, this podcast is your gateway to learning, growth, and empowerment.

Hosted by Navid Rahimian: Your host, Navid Rahimian, is more than just a CPA; he's a dynamic entrepreneur who understands the intricate balance between numbers and vision. As the driving force behind Nav Capital Consulting, Nav brings his wealth of experience and insatiable curiosity to each episode, ensuring that every conversation is not just insightful, but transformational.

Join us on a journey that transcends the ordinary, a journey that's all about embracing the spirit of going the extra mile. Subscribe now to "Overtime with Nav" and be a part of a community that celebrates success, innovation, and the unrelenting pursuit of greatness.

Subscribe now to redefine your journey to success!

description:
We’re dads who are tired of faking it.

We’ve lived life on the edges, we’ve played small, we’ve lived below our capabilities and capacities, and we are done with it.

Life’s amazing gift will not be wasted on us.

We will live to our full measure.

We will take full ownership of our lives, our relationships, our health, and lead a life of meaning and purpose

There is no more space for "killing time."

We recognize that how we spend each moment builds our days, which builds our years, and ultimately our destiny.

We were created for more.

title: J'ai décidé de changer le monde. Serge Brocteur - CEO de MyNewMe
description:
Rejoignez Serge, CEO de MyNewMe, alors qu'il partage avec vous sa vie quotidienne et sa quête pour répandre le bonheur à travers le monde grâce à un site web novateur, mais surtout à un nouveau type d'entreprise. Une entreprise respectueuse de chaque humain.

Découvrez les coulisses de son parcours personnel en tant que développeur tant du site que du concept. Serge vous emmène dans son voyage où il partage avec vous ses espoirs, ses défis et les moments marquants qui ont façonné sa mission.

Nous explorerons aussi les récits inspirants des abonnés de MyNewMe.net qui se sont joints à la communauté dans le but de créer un impact positif dans leur vie et dans la vie des autres. Vous vivrez avec nous l'évolution des financement participatifs, nos améliorations, nos objectifs, ...

La communauté est mise en avant, nos Influenceurs aussi ! Vous aurez la joie d'entendre parler de ces propagateurs de bonheur, vous vous en présente !

Rejoignez Serge dans chaque épisode captivant alors qu'il partage des réflexions inspirantes, des leçons tirées de son parcours et des histoires qui vous laisseront motivés et prêts à créer le changement dans vos propres vies.

Abonnez-vous dès aujourd'hui pour ne manquer aucun épisode qui vous guidera vers une vie plus épanouissante et positive.

Un épisode de 30 minutes, tous les lundi et les Jeudi à 05h00 ECT

Plongez dans le monde inspirant du podcast "Objectif : Propager le Bonheur - Ma Vie comme CEO de MyNewMe".

Abonnez-vous et rejoignez-nous

title: La Ruta Del Exito
description:
Bienvenidos a "La Ruta Del Exito", el podcast en español que te acerca a las historias más inspiradoras de emprendedores, dueños de negocios e inmigrantes que han cruzado fronteras desde Latinoamérica hasta Estados Unidos en busca de un sueño.

¿Por qué decidieron dejar su país de origen? ¿Cómo fue el viaje? Y una vez aquí, ¿qué los impulsó a convertirse en emprendedores y dueños de sus propios destinos? Acompáñanos cada semana mientras exploramos estas preguntas y más, en conversaciones íntimas y reveladoras con aquellos que han desafiado las adversidades para construir un futuro mejor.

Descubre las lecciones aprendidas, los desafíos superados y las claves del éxito que han transformado vidas y negocios. Este es tu espacio para inspirarte, aprender y conectar con una comunidad de luchadores que, como tú, buscan hacer la diferencia.

title: Die Moderne Aphrodite, by Java Castoria
description:
🌟 Willkommen auf meinem Podcastl, Beautiful Soul! 🌟

Du bist reich an Möglichkeiten und Potenzialen, die nur darauf warten, von dir entdeckt zu werden. Durch Channelings, tiefes Seelenwissen und energetische Einblicke, entfalten wir die verborgenen Schätze deines Seins. Hier tauchen wir gemeinsam in die unendlichen Weiten der Energie ein, um jenseits materieller Grenzen transformative Veränderungen zu erleben. 💫💰

In einer Welt, in der Luxus und Reichtum nicht alle Fragen beantworten können, öffnen wir Türen zu tiefen, seelischen Erkenntnissen. Denn, wie ich immer sage: "Alles ist Energie, und Energie lügt nicht." 💎🌌 Entdecke, was jenseits des Materiellen liegt und finde den Schlüssel, um dir ein erfüllteres, authentischeres Leben zu kreieren. 🔮

Vergiss nie: Energie lügt nicht – sie offenbart den Weg zu deinem wahren Ich.

title: Our Work Lab: The 15 Min Break
description:
Tune in and listen to the conversations between a Business Executive and a Medical Doctor all themed around current work and life topics – all wrapped into 15 minutes!

Dr. Kriti Nanda and Amit A. Sidhpura spread awareness around the importance and impact of Mental and Emotional Health in the current time. All with a simple goal: to help individuals understand themselves better, so they experience growth and lead a life of happiness, inner peace, and sustainable success.

Amit is global executive, with 15+ years of experience in helping people and talent learn how to transform. Currently, Amit is the Global Strategy Leader for IBM Talent Transformation Consulting and founder of City Monk and Project Transformation. Two global initiatives designed to help Leaders and Entrepreneurs, connect and experience their “Inner Superpowers.”

Kriti Nanda is a Medical Doctor with a holistic approach, including a specialisation in Psychosomatic Medicine. Kriti uses her knowledge and expertise as a Personal Transformation and Mental Health Coach, sharing research in Contemplative Sciences and developing Digital Tools for Mindfulness.

title: The Logan Schwartz Podcast
description:
Trying to achieve in life can be daunting, but it can also be an exciting and rewarding experience. In this podcast, we follow the journey of a young entrepreneur who is trying to make it in this world. From initial ideas to the final products, we will explore the challenges and triumphs that come with trying to achieve in business & life.

Our host, Logan, is like many of you reading this, wanting to do be and do more with life, but feeling alone, and overwhelmed by the process. Tune in, while Logan shares his insights and experiences, providing valuable advice and tips on how to navigate the ups and downs of succeeding through life. Along the way, we will meet other entrepreneurs who share their stories and offer their own unique perspectives on what it takes to succeed.

Whether you’re an aspiring entrepreneur or just someone who loves a good success story, this podcast is for you. Join us as we explore the world of business and discover what it takes to turn your dreams into reality.

Cheers,

Logan Schwartz

In each episode, we'll sit down with a diverse range of guests, from entrepreneurs and business owners to local heroes and change-makers, and everyday people doing extraordinary things. description:
Welcome to "Sound Waves of the Submariner," the podcast that dives deep into the incredible journey of a Navy Submarine Veteran turned Music Producer. Join us as we uncover the extraordinary life of our host, as he takes us from the depths of the ocean to the captivating world of music production. Get ready to embark on a thrilling voyage as we navigate through riveting tales of courage, resilience, and the unbreakable bond of brotherhood forged beneath the waves. In each episode, our host shares captivating anecdotes from his time serving aboard submarines and how this unique experience inspired his passion for music. Discover the transformative power of melody and rhythm as we explore the profound impact it has on our lives. From epic tales of survival to the creative process behind crafting soul-stirring beats, this podcast is a treasure trove of untold stories and timeless melodies. So, grab your headphones and prepare to be captivated by the remarkable life of a Navy Submarine Veteran turned Music Producer. Welcome aboard the "Sound Waves of the Submariner" – your ticket to an unforgettable auditory odyssey.

title: הפודקאסט של נטע צ׳רנר
description:
הפודקאסט של נטע צרנר,

העולם שלנו משתנה כל הזמן ובקצב מהיר מאי פעם

וכך גם אנחנו צריכים לדעת להשנות איתו.

אנחנו חייבים לפתח גמישות מחשבתית, לפתוח את התודעה ולשים סימני שאלה על כל מה שידענו.

בפודקאסט נראיין אנשים מעניינים שאני מאמינה שיש להם משהו ללמד אותנו, הם יכולים להיות מומחים בתחומם , יזמים, מנהיגים ויוצרים.

ננסה להבין איך הם הגיעו לאן שהם הגיעו מה הם למדו מהניסיון ומהמחקרים שלהם ומה הם יכולים ללמד אותנו?

בפודקאסט נדבר על נושאים שמעניינים אותנו ועל נושאים שאנחנו עוד לא יודעים שמעניינים אותנו,

עם מטרה אחת ברורה - להתעסק בכל מה שעושה לנו טוב.

הפודקאסט מתאים לכל אדם שרוצה להיות הגרסה הכי טובה של עצמו ומוכן גם להשקיע בעצמו.

מנחת הפודקאסט היא נטע צרנר , יזמית , אשת עסקים, מרצה, קאוצרית, יוצרת תוכן, משפיענית ומנהלת קהילה.

נטע מאמינה שאין דרך נכונה לחיות את החיים , שכל אחד יבחר מה שעושה לו טוב והדרך הקלה ביותר לבחור היא כשאנחנו יודעים איזה אופציות יש לנו.

והכי חשוב תבואו להנות

description: Welcome to Access Genie, the podcast that opens doors to success in the world of entrepreneurship. I'm your host Ancillar Nombewu, a multi-award winning journalist and entrepreneur. Entrepreneurship is hard and lonely. So I've started this podcast for all entrepreneurs, leaders and genies looking to learn from those who have walked the path to success. This podcast gives you access to the minds of Africa's most exceptional individuals, from visionary entrepreneurs to awe-inspiring athletes, captivating entertainers to thought leaders. Each episode is like a masterclass in winning in business and in life. I believe that knowledge is the key to unlocking your inner genie. If you enjoy this content please Subscribe, follow and share this podcast with your friends.

title: The Other Russian
description:
The inspiration for this podcast came from Raghavendra, a friend I met in India in 2012 through couchsurfing. Our bond grew over the years, and during a trip to India in 2023, he suggested I start a podcast. Despite being jetlagged and high, I embraced the idea. My wife was initially hesitant due to concerns about quality, but I decided to dive in and improve as I go.

A bit about me: I was born in Sverdlovsk, now Ekaterinburg, known for its historical significance and as a cultural crossroad between Europe and Asia. My upbringing was challenging. After the 1998 economic crisis, my father turned to alcohol, leading to his separation from our family when I was 13. My mother worked multiple jobs to support us. I wasn't academically inclined, but my mother's guidance led me to study project management at Ural State Technical University. During my studies, my sister introduced me to the Work&Travel program in the USA. My trip to Maine in 2006 was transformative, exposing me to a new culture and broadening my horizons. After university, I also earned a military degree, ironically in bridge-building, given my humanities background.

This is just the beginning of my story, and I have much more to share.

The topics that I plan to cover in this podcast: politics, psychedelics, feminism, marketing, business, sex, drugs, music, philosophy, change, humans, etc.

title: My First Lead
description:
Welcome to the most relatable business podcast that exists. Here we have tactical conversations with regular Joe/Jane business owners that became successful the normal way, grinding and persevering.

These are not the the likes of genius outliers like the Steve Jobs or Elon Musks of the world, but your very own top local business owner in your city.

Every week, we will publish interviews with the Top business owners and find out how they got started, and most especially, how they got their very FIRST set of leads/customers/clients.

title: Safe & Sound in the Digital Age
description:
Description:

Welcome to "Safe & Sound in the Digital Age," the podcast where we unravel the intricate web of digital transformation and cybersecurity to guide you towards a future where you and your business thrive securely in the digital landscape.

In a world that's rapidly evolving, the digital realm is where innovation, opportunity, and risk converge. As we navigate this landscape, it's crucial to stay informed, empowered, and vigilant. Hosted by the insightful and bestselling author, Nicholas P. Lorizio, whose book "Digitalization: The New Normal of the Post-Pandemic World" laid the groundwork for understanding the digital revolution, this podcast is your compass for safe passage through the digital age.

What to Expect:

Join us as we embark on a journey deep into the heart of digital transformation and cybersecurity. With each episode, we explore the stories, strategies, and solutions that define the intersection of technology and business.

Here's a taste of what you can expect:

*1. Digital Transformation Chronicles: Discover how leading companies are reshaping their operations, strategies, and customer experiences through digital innovation. We delve into their journeys, successes, and the lessons learned along the way.

*2. Cybersecurity Safeguards: In today's interconnected world, cyber threats are ever-present. We go beyond the headlines to explore the evolving landscape of cybersecurity. Learn from experts and industry leaders about the latest threats, vulnerabilities, and strategies to protect your business and personal data. Our mission is to arm you with knowledge, so you can fortify your digital defenses.

*3. Insightful Interviews: Our show is enriched by engaging conversations with thought leaders, industry pioneers, and entrepreneurs who've navigated the digital frontier. Hear their stories, gain access to their expertise, and uncover their insights.

*4. Practical Guidance: We understand that knowledge without action is only half the battle. That's why each episode provides actionable takeaways and practical tips you can implement immediately. From securing your network to optimizing your digital strategy, we're here to help.

*5. Digitalization Spotlight: We revisit key themes from Nicholas P. Lorizio's book, "Digitalization: The New Normal of the Post-Pandemic World." Gain a deeper understanding of how digitalization is reshaping industries, societies, and economies worldwide. Explore the implications and possibilities of the new normal.

*6. Interactive Community: Our commitment to your digital well-being goes beyond the podcast. Join our vibrant online community, where listeners like you share experiences, ask questions, and collaborate on digital challenges. Together, we create a network of support and knowledge exchange.

Why "Safe & Sound"?

Our podcast title, "Safe & Sound in the Digital Age," captures our mission: to empower you in navigating the digital landscape confidently and securely amid today's era of innovation and disruption. Knowledge is your strongest defense.

Our commitment is clear: provide you with insights, stories, and strategies not only for survival but for thriving in this digital era. Whether you're a business owner, tech enthusiast, or simply curious about the digital world, "Safe & Sound in the Digital Age" offers valuable insights. Join us on this exhilarating expedition through the digital age, where we'll unlock the secrets to thriving, innovating, and securing your place in a world where the digital and physical realms converge.

Subscribe now and embark on this journey of discovery, transformation, and security.

Welcome to "Safe & Sound in the Digital Age."

title: The TechTorchbearers
description:
The TechTorchbearers is a podcast channel dedicated to exploring the intersection of technology, entrepreneurship, and social responsibility. In a rapidly evolving digital landscape, our mission is to shed light on the innovators, thought leaders, and trailblazers who are committed to using technology as a force for good.

Join us as we delve deep into conversations with visionaries who are shaping the tech industry with a strong sense of ethical and social responsibility. We explore their journeys, insights, and the impact of their work on society. From sustainable startups and socially conscious entrepreneurs to groundbreaking technological advancements, we strive to inspire and inform our listeners.

Through engaging discussions and thought-provoking interviews, "Illuminating the Future of Responsible Tech" aims to empower individuals and businesses to make informed choices, embrace responsible innovation, and contribute positively to the future of technology. Join us on this enlightening journey toward a brighter, more ethical tech-driven future.

title: The Self-Educated
description:
The education system has failed. And it's up to us to seek out the education we need.

In my view there are two things that people need to be successful: mindset and skills.

I talk to the best educators in the world about everything from growing businesses, raising families and developing a successful mindset.

I'm also documenting the things I'm learning and have learned that have pushed me forward.

My intention is for you too, to be self-educated so that you can crush life.
